description: Retro signage and neighbourhood charm proves to be a successful gezellig combination judging by reviews. Worth a look? (added June 2023)

name: Klid v ruchu
description:
City: Olomouc
description: Interesting little cabin with nice beer garden. Seems worth a look. (Added June 2023)

name: Baar Living Room ät.
description:
City: Tallinn
description: Well reviewed bar in a large old green wood strip cladded house with vintage furnishings. Seems worth a look! (Added June 2023)

name: Pub Drewutnia
description:
City: Kraków
description: Well out of the centre, this Karczma type pub has rustic charm and local life. Was too quiet on our first visit to give a fair appraisal but seems like it would be pretty atmospheric when busy. (Added June 2023)

name: The Shepherd's Rest Inn
description:
City: Lumbutts
description: Looks like a fairly decent unspoilt country/roadside inn with carpets, beams, brasses, the works, and very well reviewed. (Added June 2023)

name: The Bulls Head
description:
City: Monyash
description: Unspoilt, quite genteel Derbyshire country inn with an appealing cosy-looking interior. Excellent reviews. (Added June 2023)

name: Strawanza
description:
City: Bamberg
description: A slightly alternative post-grad bar that has more of a French bar feel than German overall. A little bit of a clique feel, but worth a try if you are seeking a change from the traditional beer halls. (Added June 2023)

name: Cafe Clodette
description:
City: Antwerp
description: Good looking café straddling the brown café format with some more modern leanings. Worth a try, well reviewed. (Added June 2023)

name: Southgate Inn
description:
City: Devizes
description: Superb looking traditional real ale pub with social, informal setup and genteel surroundings. Well worth a look, excellent reviews. (Added June 2023)

name: The Butterleigh Inn
description:
City: Butterleigh
description: Village pub with genteel rustic interior, simple surroundings. Excellent reviews. (Added June 2023)

name: The Leathern Bottle
description:
City: Lewknor
description: Simple rustic village pub with typical, timeless surroundings. Well reviewed. (Added June 2023)

name: Sidrērija
description:
City: Riga
description: Unusual venue, a cider place with warm pubby surroundings. (Added June 2023)

name: Poltimore Arms
description:
City: Yarde Down
description: Beautiful rustic rural pub with hanging hops, candles, piano, pool table, settles and almost the works that make up a traditional English pub. Unspoilt and authentic, this looks superb. (Added June 2023)

name: 't Waagstuk
description:
City: Antwerp
description: Reopened and renovated, a larger venue than the typical brown café but not unlike it in décor. Good beer selection. Good reviews. Worth a try? (Added June 2023)

name: De Broodwinning
description:
City: Antwerp
description: Well-reviewed little corner brown cafe with personalised bar area and a bit of character. Food but definitely pubby space in there. (Added June 2023)

name: Luda Kuća
description:
City: Belgrade
description: Homely neighbourhood pub with the lurid detail that war criminal Radovan Karadzic used to frequent it. (Added June 2023)

name: Pub Brod
description:
City: Belgrade
description: Looks a pretty decent all-rounder pub overall with a terrace too. Good reviews, worth a look? (Added June 2023)

name: Pub Got
description:
City: Herceg Novi
description: A distinctive, very well reviewed pub with personalised interior, pubby interior with beams and jugs, and a sea view on the terrace. Potentially superior drinks options. (Added June 2023)

name: Bierteufl
description:
City: Vienna
description: Wood, wood and more wood at this pubby cabin of beer. Looks worth a try. (Added June 2023)

name: Cafe Weidinger
description:
City: Vienna
description: A frozen in time retro café that's quite a distance away from the average opulent, dressy venue in Vienna. (Added June 2023)

name: Radocha
description:
City: Krakow
description: Reasonably interesting little basement pub, low-key, usual explosed brick vaults, some decoration in a rustic/artsy theme. Excellent reviews, apparently some folk nights. Worth checking out. (Added June 2023)

name: Ministerstwo Tajemnic
description:
City: Krakow
description: Theme pub, unofficial wizard world with 3 floors and plenty of attention paid to the decor and environment. Good reviews overall but grumbling about table service and erratic quality of food. Still, looks unique, worth a try? (Added June 2023)

name: Świat Piwa
description:
City: Kraków
description: Bottleshop with small cosy hangout space, looks alright and well reviewed. We visited here in 2022 but it didn't exactly blow us away. A standard craft beer cafe, decent rather than distinctive (added October 2021)

name: Mały Kredens Katowice
description:
City: Katowice
description: Kazimierz style antique café bar that looks fairly brooding and atmospheric. (added June 2023)

name: Teoria – kluboczajownia
description:
City: Katowice
description: Interesting looking offbeat cafe bar. The angle is tea but there is a selection of alternatives, and it is mainly about the atmosphere. Very good reviews. (added June 2023)

name: Stacja Bosacka
description:
City: Krakow
description: Versatile looking corner pub with table football, pizza, decent beers. Well reviewed. On our first visit we liked the basement warren of rooms but it was still lacking wow factor. Might try again when it's night time (Added June 2023)

name: Red Lion Pub
description:
City: Ampney St Peter
description: A hidden gem, a little museum of a rural pub that has passed ownership recently but all signs point to its heritage being maintained. Very little info but surely worth a look if even vaguely close by. (Added July 2023)

name: Zwiebelfisch
description:
City: Berlin
description: Decent looking pubby bar/wirtshaus with some lived in character. Worth a look. (Added July 2023)

name: The Three Mariners
description:
City: Hythe
description: Cult backstreet boozer and hangout with real ales and unspoilt interior. Looks very good. (Added July 2023)

name: Pension REZEK-Jeruzalem
description:
City: Vitkovice
description: Revivalist Inn with preserved interior. Fabulous reviews, looks homely and cosy. (Added July 2023)

name: Letní výčep Beranova pivovaru
description:
City: Bílá
description: Very pleasant looking rustic, revivalist farm brewery with genteel inn and gardens. Excellent reviews. (Added July 2023)

name: IL COVO Beer House
description:
City: Peschiara del Garda
description: Brick vaulted homely little craft beer bar with some personality that can be seen. Excellent reviews, worth a look, surely. (Added July 2023)

name: Pivo Friisgatan - en tjeckisk ölstuga
description:
City: Malmö,
description: Czech and German beer specialists in a traditional, authentic looking setting. (Added July 2023)

name: Brauhaus Döbler GmbH & Co. KG
description:
City: Bad Windsheim
description: A classic dark brown unspoilt Gaststatte interior, excellent own brewed beers, A recommended city centre staple which reaches a higher standard than most, supposedly. (Added July 2023)

name: Zielono Mi
description:
City: Kraków 
description: Popular with locals, this tram terminus shack has an exposed wooden interior with beams but relevant feeling décor and atmosphere. Maybe missing a few touches but worth a look next time out? (Added July 2023)

name: Brasserie de l'Ermitage
description:
City: Brussels
description: Although the bar area is identikit modern craft bar, the venue itself, former industrial use has a fair bit of character. Popular and well reviewed, conveniently located too, so probably worth a look. (Added July 2023)

name: Wyszak Family Brewery
description:
City: Szczecin
description: Central vaulted cellar with stunning interior, typical city centre brewpub format otherwise, but seems worth a try. (Added July 2023)

name: Hospoda Brouk
description:
City: Prague
description: Friendly evening dive bar with table football and the most casual, battered old hangout spot. Perhaps short on an inclusion but worth having up your sleeve. We've been here a few times. (Added 2020)

name: Kawenzmann
description:
City: Bamberg
description: Tiki bar/cocktail bar that fell just short of an inclusion overall, but is worth looking out for with an adventurous cocktail menu and some flair to the decor. (Added August 2023)

name: Bahler Zoigl
description:
City: Neuhaus an der Waldnaab
description: Zoiglstubn, one of many brewing families in the village

name: Pivní lok
description:
City: Cheb
description: Basement bottle shop cum bar with curved ceiling and some space to socialise. Modern options. Looked decent when we had a poke around, but didn't have time to stay for a drink. (Added August 2023)

name: Stefflwirt
description:
City: Wiesau
description: Unspoilt family owned pub who are also a butcher's more or less guaranteeing a good spread of food with the beer which is local unfiltered Zoigl type stuff. The interior looks legit with wood panels and simple communal tables. Worth a go. 

Please note this is a Zoigl pub and therefore only open 1 x every month. Please consult the Zoigl Kalendar or their Facebook for further info (Added August 2023)

name: Zoiglstub‘n Fichtenschacht
description:
City: Wiesau
description: Another treasured Zoiglstube, family run pubs that use a communal brewery and open on rotation a few days a month when their beer is ready to drink. Unique and well worth seeking out, though refer to the Zoigl Kalendar online to ensure it will be open for your visit (Added August 2023)

name: Wort&Klang
description:
City: Erlangen
description: A fashionable but still pretty casual, ad hoc studenty bar with vintage furniture, the usual impressive Franconian beer selection, piano and table football. (Added August 2023)

name: Steinbach Brewery Erlangen
description:
City: Erlangen
description: An ur-typical city brewpub with revivalist retro-signage, huge rows of hanging hops, exposed brewkit and atmospheric beer garden. (Added August 2023)

name: Brauereigaststätte Barnikel
description:
City: Herrndorf
description: A pickled in aspic pub with a brewing operation that ceased in 2012 (their beers are now contract brewed by Rothenbach in Aufsess) but the main appeal is the surviving quirky charm of the bierstube, local life and still good food and drink. Worth a look! (Added August 2023)

name: Klosterbräu Bamberg
description:
City: Bamberg
description: A brewing reputation that has soared back to the heights in recent years with its smoked and dark beers particularly acclaimed. The venue didn't completely knock us over last time, a little bit twee and stuffy in the bar area, while the better side room lacks a focal point and really deserved to have the bar there. This leaves a slightly mixed picture where we couldn't justify an inclusion. If you are doing a crawl of the breweries though, you need to keep this in mind. (Added August 2023)

name: La Grappe
description:
City: Rennes
description: Super wine bar/bistro that also served beer, cocktail, whiskies in an intimate personalised environment. A great shame we missed it on our last visit (Added August 2023)

name: One Pint Pub
description:
City: Helsinki
description: A nice looking all-rounder, modern but reasonably pubby with a good selection. (Added August 2023)

name: Ravintola Henriks
description:
City: Tampere
description: Aka Kerho, this is a traditional wood-fit corner pub with a great beer selection. (Added August 2023)

name: Stöhrenkeller
description:
City: Bamberg
description: A local pubby hangout spot with a balance of socialising and food. (Added August 2023)

name: De Gele Poraa
description:
City: Brussels
description: A local fun hangout spot. Wood strip, table football, live music. Well reviewed. (Added August 2023)

name: Vinicola Mentridana
description:
City: Madrid
description: Traditional tabern with wall of wines and simple tables. Mixed reviews but seems legitimate, worth a look? (Added August 2023)

name: U Kováře Matěje
description:
City: Vesely Kopec
description: Genteel rustic country Hostinec with wood panels and homely feel. Well reviewed and it certainly looks like a good one! (Added August 2023)

name: Zájezdní hostinec Krčma
description:
City: Lanskroun
description: A rustic pub more akin to a German Gaststatte, Dark wood, heavy beamed ceiling, genteel furnishings. The surroundings look pleasant (Added August 2023)

name: Brüsseler Eck
description:
City: Berlin
description: A Kiezkneipe with retro bar and signage, simple working class pubby vibes. Worth checking out. (Added August 2023)

name: Auracher Löchl - Stollen 1930
description:
City: Kufstein
description: Highly unusual venue, a complex even with some rustic nooks in the restaurant, but the star of the show is the gin bar with the widest selection in Austria - and they claim the world! (Added August 2023)

name: The Gladstone Arms
description:
City: London
description: As featured in David Jesudason's 'Desi Pubs', British Indian-run pub mixing eclectric decor, good beers and community events. Cultural melting pot and Clearly a must-visit. (Added August 2023)

name: The Providence
description:
City: Plymouth
description: Super personalised, cosy-looking backstreet pub with a neighbourly feel to it. Superb reviews, surely worth a look. (added August 2023)

name: The Triangle Tavern
description:
City: Lowestoft
description: Award winning sidestreet boozer with good range of ales, hops above the bar and genteel surroundings. Well reviewed. (Added August 2023)

name: The Rumburgh Buck
description:
City: Rumburgh
description: Unspoilt country in with small bar, flagstone floor and settles. Excellent reviews, Genteel, rustic charm. (Added August 2023)

name: Carpenters Arms
description:
City: Walterstone
description: A superbly unspoilt remote country inn with original rooms, flag stone floors, fireplace and cosiness all around. Excellent reviews. (Added August 2023)

name: Cask Beer
description:
City: Porto
description: Beer specialists with 1 cask line (not in use on our visit) in a small cafe bar with mezzanine area near the river. The overall experience was fine but not outstanding. (Added September 2023)

name: Taberna da Poncha
description:
City: Lombo do Moleiro
description: Fabulous looking worn-in, homely roadside tavern with a personalised appearance. Very highly rated. (Added August 2023)

name: HopTrip Craft Beer Shop
description:
City: Matosinhos
description: A modern but personalised and highly rated craft beer hangout. (added August 2023)

name: Macska
description:
City: Budapest
description: Well reviewed venue with exposed brick vaults and live music. (Added August 2023)

name: Wolframstubn
description:
City: Windischeschenbach
description: Home brew in a real family run pub. Go now while you still can. http://zoiglbier.de/zoigltermine/ Check if it'll be open

name: Gasthof Weisser Schwan
description:
City: Windischeschenbach
description: A very pleasant rustic Gasthof with a social scene of sorts and Zoigl on tap. It does feature on the Echter Zoigl's list of official venues and apparently they brew. The place didn't quite cut it for a guide entrant but is well worth checking out. Be careful with opening times. (Assessed on July 2023, and again October 2024)

name: Loistl Rudolf u. Anni, Zoigl-Schänke
description:
City: Windischeschenbach
description: Unclear if this is open any longer, but it is one of the town's Zoiglstubn where families use a communal brewery then open their doors on rotation. Hopefully it isn't dead. (Added August 2023)

name: Zoiglstube "Hammerer"
description:
City: Tirschenreuth
description: Zoiglstube. Not part of the Echter tradition but still a rare and dying practise. Go now while you can. (Added August 2023)

name: Zoigl-Stube Hofner
description:
City: Konnersreuth
description: Zoiglbier from Falkenberg at this Oberpfalz Zoiglstube.

name: Zoiglstubn zum Glöckerlbauer
description:
City: Weiden in der Oberpfalz
description: Excellent personalised, homely looking Zoiglstube that looks like it will be cosy in Winter. Great reviews. (Added August 2023)

name: Bar Emily
description:
City: Malaga
description: Superbly cosy looking little bar with framed photographs studding the wall, and fairylights. Excellent reviews. Looks like a must-visit. (Added August 2023)

name: Seven Stars
description:
City: Dartmouth
description: An unsympathetic greywashing may have occurred but the low ceilings and bar area remain unspoilt with a good degree of authenticity in the town's oldest pub. Maybe to file under promising rather than world beating. (added August 2023)

name: Casa Puga
description:
City: Almeria
description: Classical tiled tavern from 1870 with personal touches all over. Maybe a little upright and food-focused? We'll see... (Added August 2023)

name: Dog & Partridge Inn
description:
City: Sowood
description: Unspoilt, seemingly perservering old country pub. Info thin on the ground but excellent reviews. Worth a look? (Added August 2023)

name: The Fir Tree Pub
description:
City: Oxford
description: Victorian corner pub with some whimsical, personalised decor, retro signage and great reviews. Looks a potential star. (Added August 2023)

name: Dambusters Inn (Official Hours On Website)
description:
City: Scampton
description: Famous RAF memorabilia pub. Certainly an impressive array on show, but signs of unwise redecoration too when compared with the pubs appearance even 2 years ago. It will have to be seen, nonetheless. (Added August 2023)

name: The Castle Tap
description:
City: Reading
description: Decent looking casual ale house with cases racked up behind the bar, wooden bench seating, globe lighting and handsome ornate back bar with tankards. (Added August 2023)

name: The Blue Ship
description:
City: The Haven
description: An unspoilt genteel country Inn with low slung ceiling and rural flavour. Good reviews. (Added August 2023)

name: The Freed Man
description:
City: Walmer
description: A truly superb looking neighbourhood pub, labour of love interior with personal possessions and a lovely social setting. Very strong reviews. Need to go here. (Added August 2023)

name: Bishops Wine Bar
description:
City: Croydon
description: Peculiar brown café styled wine bar in unusual shopping centre location. A one-off. Worth a look? (Added August 2023)

name: The Woodman's Stroke
description:
City: Rothley
description: Attractive, unspoilt looking village pub with typical traditional interior of low beams, chunky tables and settles. Outstanding reviews. (Added August 2023)

name: The Woodlark Inn
description:
City: Lambley
description: Perhaps a little twee in its furnishings and decor but also looks very homely. A village pub with natural social space and charm. Very well reviewed. (Added August 2023)

name: The Basketmakers Arms
description:
City: Brighton
description: A must-visit venue, a neighbourhood pub with friendly approach and highly personalised interior without losing the backstreet boozer aesthetic or charm. Excellent reviews. (Added August 2023)

name: The Watchmaker's Arms
description:
City: Hove
description: A small alehouse with some charm, personality and atmosphere. Genteel decor with mid-brown wood furniture and fittings and hanging hops. (Added August 2023)

name: 100 Renthen
description:
City: Lviv
description: Well-reviewed true local pub with lots of taps and good neighbourhood life. (Added August 2023)

name: O Nosso Bar
description:
City: Funchal
description: One of a few remaining local's corner bars. Oddly even has Franziskaner on tap. Affordable and friendly, occasionally gregarious. You will be tolerated. (Added August 2023)

name: Pub Number Two
description:
City: Funchal
description: Pubby tavern that looks like an all-rounder. Perhaps a backup/versatile option. (Added August 2023)

name: FugaCidade
description:
City: Funchal
description: Multitap craft beer bar with a tolerable enough looking interior. Well reviewed. Didn't quite cut it overall, despite friendly service and a great beer selection, the venue itself was a little lacking (Added August 2023)

name: Café Klandestino
description:
City: Lisbon
description: Colourful, eclectic and atmospheric looking bar with great reviews. (Added August 2023)

name: Social B
description:
City: Lisbon
description: Attractive evening bar with arched ceiling, lamps and wooden back bar. (Added August 2023)

name: Alface Hall Hostel & Bar
description:
City: Lisbon
description: Informal hangout spot with music, looks pretty atmospheric, although the connection to hostel/backpackers may give pause for thought. Still, may check it out. (Added August 2023)

name: Cockpit bar
description:
City: Lisbon
description: Small but very characterful, densely decorated cocktail bar. Intimate with tall ceiling, mezzanine area overlooking a bar. (Added August 2023)

name: Otto Schrüfer
description:
City: Preisendorf
description: A genteel Gaststatte and microbrewery with home spun hospitality and supposedly a friendly crowd. Well reviewed. Check opening times carefully. (Added September 2023)

name: Romanoff pub
description:
City: Porto
description: Cocktail bar with grand chandelier type glass ornamentation at the bar, and style that seems to run somewhere between Jugenstil and gothic. Compact, well reviewed. (Added September 2023)

name: Dog & Duck Inn
description:
City: Beverley
description: Comfortable loungey neighbourhood pub with a local crowd and good ales. Well reviewed. Worth a look at least? (Added September 2023)

name: The Royal Oak
description:
City: Driffield
description: Perplexingly short on info on google but from what we've seen elsewhere this is a fine, comfy looking neighbourhood pub off the beaten path. Worth a try, surely. (Added September 2023)

name: Grove Tavern
description:
City: Tunbridge Wells
description: Low ceilinged, warm wood fit neighbourhood pub that looks quite pleasant. Worth a look? (Added September 2023)

name: Mala Gissona Beer House Gros
description:
City: Donostia
description: A very tidily put together craft beer specialists taking cues from a range of spots. Modern but well executed with an identity and feel to it, seemingly. Worth a look? (Added September 2023)

name: Albert Tavern
description:
City: Freuchie
description: Special traditional pub with old school hospitality, a rarity in the area. Great reviews. (Added September 2023)

name: Moseleck
description:
City: Frankfurt
description: Says Gaststatte outside, and a Pilsbar feel inside, and the combination appears to form a pubby Germany pub (relatively rate). Rough and ready of course, but personalised and worth a look at least. (Added September)

name: The Prince of Wales
description:
City: Farnborough
description: Tasteful low key village pub with half timber exposed brick walls, upholstered bench seats, several cask ales. Excellent reviews. (Added September 2023)

name: The Railway Inn
description:
City: Lower Largo
description: Low ceilinged, cosily appointed 'proper pub' with excellent reviews. A real gem for the area. Looks well worth trying. (Added September 2023)

name: The Old Ship Inn
description:
City: Perth
description: Cosy wood fit town tavern with a bunker like feel but friendly approach. Great reviews. (Added September 2023)

name: Bakery Kvilda Ltd.
description:
City: Kvilda
description: Intriguing operation - brewery and bakery with environment of wood strip classic hospoda. No amazing reviews but surely worth look into? (Added September 2023)

name: Dreadnought Leith
description:
City: Leith
description: An alehouse with a relevant feel while keeping in place some of the classic fittings. Excellent reviews. (Added September 2023)

name: The Warwick Arms
description:
City: London
description: Attractive classical corner London pub with ornate wood fittings, distinctive decorations and tiles by the bar. (Added September 2023)

name: The Halfway House
description:
City: Pitney Hill
description: Genteel rustic country pub with big fireplace, hanging hops, low key furniture and multiple ales on offer. Excellent reviews. (Added September 2023)

name: Kings Head
description:
City: Gunnerside
description: Unspoilt Pennines village pub with the ensemble of cosy seating, chunky furniture, low ceilings, fireplace, flag stone floor, real ales and big portions of pub grub. Excellent reviews. (Added September 2023)

name: King's Head Theatre Pub
description:
City: London
description: Intimate looking pub with theatrical memorabilia and a traditional Victorian fit layout, with quirks such as a pre-decimal till. Some real ales on offer. (Added September 2023)

name: The Anne of Cleves
description:
City: Melton Mowbray
description: An upright, slightly food focused but still attractive rustic pub with flagstone floor, fireplace, chunky furnishings and ales. Well reviewed, surely worth a look? (Added September 2023)

name: The Prince Rupert
description:
City: Newark on Trent
description: A new reason to try Newark? Retro signage in an expanded building which has kept its character well with ante-rooms and an atrium. Well reviewed. (Added September 2023)

name: Snob Bar
description:
City: Lisbon
description: Damn...well, it seems we missed out on this one. Famous in the 70s for being a place for latest news and gossip for journalists and politicians, you'll find an intimate, shady wood fit interior with table lights. Although recent reviews have dragged it down, it looks worth a try for the ambience and interior alone. (added September 2023)

name: Pivnice 8
description:
City: Brno
description: Popular multitap place with a local crowd, light wood but reasonably nice looking space and great reviews. Have been there twice now and it's close but not quite crossing the threshold (Added September 2023)

name: Pivní bar Na Maničkách
description:
City: Brno
description: Homely, personalised rustic pub with vaulted beams, exceptional reviews. Looks really promising! (Added September 2023)

name: Expedition Clubhouse - SirFogg.com
description:
City: Brno
description: Bohemian hangout with musical instruments, performance events, casual space to explore. Worth a look? (Added September 2023)

name: Levist Väljas
description:
City: Tallinn
description: Basement bar for locals with brick vaults, one that "hasn't changed like all the others", supposedly. When we visited it felt a bit tacky overall, but you may wish to keep it in mind for a late option (Added October 2023)

name: Naabrid
description:
City: Tallinn
description: Decent looking antiquey atmosphere in this multitap craft beer bar with great reviews. (Added October 2023)

name: Purtse Tap Room Telliskivi
description:
City: Tallinn
description: A strong contender here, multitap bar with a bit of personality and character, natural ambience. (Added October 2023)

name: Бар Света
description:
City: Tallinn
description: Artsy off-beat 'space' which becomes a club later on. It's quite serviceable overall but a bit too warehousey. Worth bearing in mind though.  (Added October 2023)

name: Clarendon Public House
description:
City: Marske
description: Throwback boozer with out of time toilets and North East flavour. Rare example of real ale upkeep in the region. (Added October 2023)

name: The Old Bowling Green
description:
City: Winster
description: Old club house and pub in stone building. Excellent reviews and a fairly unspoilt interior too. (Added October 2023)

name: Den Obelix
description:
City: Halle
description: Reasonably brown café like interior with good beer options,  local favourite by the square. (Added October 2023)

name: 8 Sail Brewery Ltd.
description:
City: Heckington
description: Dramatic setting by train station and windmill for this rustic brewery tap. Excellent reviews, looks well worth a try. (added October 2023)

name: The Edgar Wallace
description:
City: London
description: Well-reviewed drinking bunker studded with beer clips, retro signage above a thick carpet. Some misgivings about the furnishings but looks easily worth a try. (Added October 2023)

name: Star Inn
description:
City: Wenhaston
description: A must-visit pub with recovered signage and a rustic, country feel. Super reviews. (added October 2023)

name: Kneipe Knaack 94
description:
City: Berlin
description: Bawdy casual hangout with red light, curtains and upturned bottles from the ceiling. As much a casual kneipe as all that though, a typical Berlin kiezkneipe. (Added October 2023)

name: Bar Belga
description:
City: Fuengirola
description: Fairly faithful pubby looking Belgium themed café with good beer selection. Well Reviewed. (Added October 2023)

name: The Admiral Lord Rodney
description:
City: Colne
description: Attractive homely pub with good real ale selection, just outside the town by the river. (Added October 2023)

name: The Central
description:
City: Gateshead
description: Famous Gateshead pub that's a stalwart on the Tyneside pub scene. (Added October 2023)

City: Gdansk
description: A nice, cosy enough looking bar, colourful and clandestine, fairly informal. Good reviews. (Added October 2023)

name: Pod rurami
description:
City: Gdansk
description: Krcma type exterior and tales of good value and old fasioned format inside. Well reviewed. (Added October 2023)

name: Z INNEJ BECZKI
description:
City: Gdansk
description: Decent enough looking multitap craft beer bar with a bit of colour and design, decent crowd. (Added October 2023)

name: Graciarnia
description:
City: Gdansk
description: Basement pub, informal and fairly unpretentious looking hangout spot. Excellent reviews. (Added October 2023)

name: Bar piwny
description:
City: Gdansk
description: A true survivor, an old snack/bar pub from the PRL era churning out kebabs and cheap beers. (Added October 2023)

name: Alexandra Hotel & pub
description:
City: Hull
description: Heritage interior with supposedly vamped up beer range. Good reviews too. (Added October 2023)

name: The Red Lion
description:
City: York
description: A heritage pub in pleasingly ramshackle old building, with some nice wood fittings inside. All the same, the prevailing feeling is they aren't quite making the most of it. We'll give it another try...

name: The Tap, Ossett
description:
City: Ossett
description: Well reputed Ossett Brewery tied pub. Social focus with pub games and a cosy interior with fireplace and communal seating. Although it didn't set our world on fire on a first visit it was easily good enough to justify a 2nd visit (added October 2023)

name: Robin Hood Inn
description:
City: Pontefract
description: Reasonably nice looking roadside pub with low beams, and cosy interior. Not a rustic throwback though, looks to have been refurbed and is relatively up to date in its offerings too. Well-reviewed. (Added October 2023)

name: Hostinec U Rudyho
description:
City: Boskovice
description: A worthy enough looking personalised pub with an informal, rustic/genteel look, fairly compact. Excellent reviews. (Added October 2023)

name: "Chata Karkonoska"
description:
City: Karpacz
description: Wonderfully chunky wooden Karczma with sloping roof, huge beams and communal wooden tables. Highland life with Krakonos beer from Czechia. Looks good (Added October 2023)

name: Zamilec
description:
City: Brno
description: A largely outdoor venue that looks cosy and personalised, excellent reviews. Hauskrecht on tap. (Added October 2023)

name: Separé Vinotéka
description:
City: Prague
description: Old fashioned Vinarna (the sort that have been dying out to extinction), family-run cosy pub, unpretentious but wine focused. Several taps and interesting decor with mounted cabinet of woodwork tools (Added October 2023)

name: U Cihelny
description:
City: Prague
description: Reasonably nice looking, unspoilt and traditionally pubby pub-restaurant, a PU establishment. (Added October 2023)

name: Hospůdka U Kladiva
description:
City: Prague
description: Old school drinking den with large beer garden. 3 permanent beer lines and 1 rotating guest offering. Very low prices. West Ham United decoration. It was pleasant on our first visit but didn't quite tip the balance. We'll try again. (March 2024)

name: Hostinec Na Zámyšli
description:
City: Prague
description: Surviving old-school 4th grade Staropramen hospoda, remnant of a bygone era. Interior looks very atmospheric. Need to go here. (Added October 2023)

name: Restaurace Klepáč
description:
City: Prague
description: 'Country club', in reality an old boozer which occasionally does folk nights. Classic unspoilt boozer with an older crowd and basic drinks, eg. Breznak. Looks out of time enough to be a curiosity. Look out for Na Taborce around the corner two as some of the information has been mixed up (Added October 2023)

name: Pivní zastávka
description:
City: Prague
description: Bottleshop cum bar with an informal atmosphere. Set in a half step basement with simple seating and a social feel. Very well reviewed. (Added October 2023)

name: Pivovarská Restaurace
description:
City: Prague
description: Surviving village style pub with genteel decor and classic throwback environment. Hubertus Kacov reputedly served the best it can be (a low bar) at a low price for Prague. We found the experience pleasantly quaint on our first visit but it wasn't busy enough to get a true picture of its potential. (Added October 2023)

name: Hospudka U Kopeckych
description:
City: Prague
description: A nice looking truly pubby type operation - wood all around - with some hockey decoration. On our first visit we probably arrived too early to get a full picture of the place, but we'll return. (Added October 2023)

name: u Parku
description:
City: Prague
description: Very popular parkside Branik pub, we walked past and it was glowing with warmth and good social vibes. Members only, but you can try your luck. (Added 2023)

name: Restaurace U Šmídů
description:
City: Bila Tremesna
description: Superb looking pub opposite the train station with a personalised, genteel exterior and community to it. Featured on Czech TV's 'Tales of Old Pubs' (Added November 2023)

name: Pohostinství U Šulců
description:
City: Zabori
description: Another superb looking old pub, featuring on Czech TV's 'Tales of Old Pubs', with a Krcma type country interior, lived-in and personalised appearance. Great reviews. (Added November 2023)

name: Hostinec Lok Ham
description:
City: Hluboká nad Vltavou
description: Tidy, social focused pub with an intimate space, some live music, and a mix of people. (Added November 2023)

name: Hostinec Jamajka
description:
City: Bílá
description: Information thin on the ground, but it features in Czech TV's 'Tales of Old Pubs', and appears to have a preserved interior and bar area, as well as exceptional reviews for food. (Added November 2023)

name: The Glassmaker Tavern
description:
City: Lindava
description: Large traditional beer hall in a glass-making factory where you can see the glass made as you drink. A one-off, featured in Tales of Old Pubs on Czech TV. (Added November 2023)

name: Viper Bar
description:
City: Zlin
description: Basement late night hangout with a vibrant crowd. Informal. Didn't quite cut it on our visit but wasn't far away, and I'd return. (Added November 2023)

name: Vyhoukaná sova
description:
City: Olomouc
description: A new wave pub with good craft options and a lively social scene that looks worth a try - next time perhaps. (Added November 2023)

name: Hübner Bräu Brauereigaststätte
description:
City: Steinfeld
description: A super-looking and very well reviewed village brewery/pub-restaurant in traditional style. (Added November 2023)

name: The Reporter. Bar
description:
City: Belfast
description: A small, intimate traditional bar in the city with a literary history. Very well reviewed, looks great. (Added November 2023)

name: Nelson Head
description:
City: Horsey
description: Beautiful traditional country in with large fireplace, guns mounted on the wall and selection of sailing/nautical artwork. (Added November 2023)

name: The Earl of St Vincent
description:
City: Egloshayle
description: Refurbished and reopened traditional village pub that has kept its character. (Added November 2023)

name: Brauerei Zum Goldenen Adler Gasthof Endres
description:
City: Hofen
description: Intimate, unspoilt village pub with woodstrip walls and 1970s appearance. Very well reviewed. (Added November 2023)

name: Steps Bar
description:
City: Glasgow
description: Old-school boozer, somewhat of an institution with a mix of exposed wooden beams and grand deco type pillars. (Added November 2023)

name: Labeerynt
description:
City: Gdansk
description: Beer specialists on the site of the former 'Polski Kino' bar. Well reviewed. (Added November 2023)

name: Balsam
description:
City: Gdansk
description: Characterful, warm-hued café bar boasting Pilsner Urquell. Well reviewed. (Added November 2023)

name: Den Toogoloog
description:
City: Middelkerke
description: Beer specialists, reportedly among the best offerings in the country. Interior bland in places but some nice touches with breweriana and a mug collection. Worth a look? (Added November 2023)

name: The Kings Arms
description:
City: Manchester
description: Overall, looks worth a try. Attractive interior isn't quite replicated inside but the offerings are up to date and relevant and there appears to be a good social scene. Well reviewed (Added November 2023)

name: The George Tavern
description:
City: London
description: Old boozer turned into a music venue. Ramshackle, bohemian interior, a little spartan but there should be times where it hits a sweet spot. Well reviewed. (Added November 2023)

name: The Five Horse Shoes Inn
description:
City: Barholm
description: Characterful village pub with genteel, rustic furnishings and decor. Very well reviewed. (Added November 2023)

name: Lyndon House Hotel
description:
City: Walsall
description: Hotel with ground floor pub decorated in traditional style. Comfortable upholstered bench seating, fireplace, patterned carpet and wallpaper. Looks to have a lot of character, several cask ales available. (Added November 2023)

name: Olde England
description:
City: Northampton
description: Characterful neighbourhood pub in traditional style. Strong drinks selection, great reviews. Needs to be visited. (Added November 2023)

name: The Mill Inn
description:
City: Withington
description: 17th century village pub with attractive garden by a stream. Tastefully decorated inside sympathetic with the building. Unfortunately a Sam Smiths operated pub. (Added November 2023)

name: Rock Circus
description:
City: Ghent
description: Characterful boozer with a rock theme, plenty of tap options and lively nightlife. Good reviews. (Added November 2023)

name: Karaf House
description:
City: Kyrenia
description: Characterful and atmospheric bar, candlelit with exposed stone and wooden beams, with a wine focus. Very good reviews. (Added November 2023)

name: Telefoneke
description:
City: Antwerp
description: Very cosy little café, lived-in with a personalised touch to it. Very non-corporate. Looks like a must-visit venue. (Added November 2023)

name: Konsulat Dobrego Piwa
description:
City: Sopot
description: Low key, fairly characterful pub off the beaten path with some multitap beer options. Very good reviews. (Added November 2023)

name: Café Commerce
description:
City: Leuven
description: Attractive retro décor somewhere between a brown café and grand café, well reviewed and different from the normal offerings in the city. (Added November 2023)

name: Eet-,whisky - en bierkroeg 't Kruiske
description:
City: Deerlijk
description: Beer and whisky specialists, the venue itself reasonably characterful with wood panels and breweriana on the walls. Perhaps leaning towards a Restobar, pub restaurant, so we'll see. Excellent reviews. (Added November 2023)

name: Põhja öökull
description:
City: Tallinn
description: Beer specialists under ancient brick vaults. Looks reasonably informal and cosy, if spacious. Excellent reviews. Unfortunately it wasn't open on the days of the week we visited. (Added November 2023)

name: Barbar
description:
City: Estonia
description: Well reviewed rock-club with a well put together, if not exactly spectacular interior. The enthusiasm for the place isn't unexpected (all rock pubs tends to get ott reviews), but perhaps worth having up your sleeve as an option (Added November 2023)

name: Whisper Sister
description:
City: Tallinn
description: Speakeasy - reservation in advance required, smart casual dress code. Looks a very atmospheric setting and great reviews. Multiroom cocktail hideout. (Added November 2023)

name: Felix Felicis
description:
City: Gdansk
description: Harry Potter themed cocktail bar. If you can stomach the theme, the staff are friendly and the cocktails are very good. A pretty effective effort. (Added December 2023)

name: Pub Spółdzielczy
description:
City: Gdansk
description: Basement craft beer pub with 22 taps including 2 cask bars. Bar itself a bit too plain to make the cut but friendly service and the options are the best in the city. (Added December 2023)

name: Café Botteltje
description:
City: Ostend
description: Wood-panelled all-rounder with a good selection of bottles. Worth a look, at least? (Added December 2023)

name: Černokostelecký pivovár
description:
City: Kostelec nad Černými lesy
description: Not only a super brewery but an old fashioned Pivovarska Restaurace too, looking suitably rustic and characterful. (Added December 2023)

name: U2D, Pivnice U Dvou Dobráků
description:
City: Opava
description: Characterful bar in vaulted half step basement with ceiling covered in bar stickers. A Pivoteka and base for a nomadic local brewer as well. Great reviews and easy to see why. (Added December 2023)

name: Gold-Ochsen Brauerei
description:
City: Spielbach
description: Popular family-run pub which is surely not long for this world with a retirement age brewmaster and host, and typical lack of succession planning or heritage preservation in the region. (Added December 2023)

name: The Queens Arms
description:
City: Cowden Pound
description: One of the few remaining hostess pubs with an elderly owner - now assisted by members of the community. Opens limited hours on weekends - check before visiting. (Added December 2023)

name: Hospoda L.P. 1867
description:
City: Bratřejov
description: Superb looking characterful Hostinec with a rural, revivalist interior and cosy rustic surroundings. Excellent reviews and easy to see why. Surely worth a look if you're even vaguely in the area. (Added December 2023)

name: The Black Bull, Blaydon
description:
City: Blaydon
description: Unspoilt boozer with live gigs - a local institution. Superb reviews and not difficult to see why. Surely worth a look if in the area. (Added December 2023)

name: Ye Olde Tavern, Kington
description:
City: Kington
description: A superb looking pub est 1767, original timbers and serving hatch remains, with flagstone floor and fireplaces. Served as a station pub for a long gone railway line. We already know without going it will be an instant hit for us. (Added December 2023)

name: The Feathers Inn
description:
City: Hedley on the Hill
description: While a gastropub, the original character of the place hasn't yet been extinguished and there appears to be a good balance of cosy pubbiness to enjoy alongside the good food. (Added December 2023)

name: Red Lion
description:
City: Sennybridge
description: A characterful 'basic boozer' village pub with red panels, beams and low ceilings. Excellent reviews. (Added December 2023)

name: The Duke William
description:
City: Stourbridge
description: Craddocks brewery tap, in effect. Traditional interior dating from the Edwardian period. As expected, good range of ales. Probably needs a visit to get a better idea of atmosphere and welcome, but well reviewed. (Added December 2023)

name: The Creaky Floorboard
description:
City: Derby
description: Bohemian, shabby-chic ale house that seems distinctly un-Derby in some ways, but is tastefully executed. Great reviews. Refreshing to see something different out there. (Added December 2023)

name: Balkan Academy of Music - BAM Belgrade
description:
City: Belgrade
description: Alternative, eclectic cultural centre with local acts and hangout space that seems well worth a look. Based in the increasingly popular Dorcol district. (Added December 2023)

name: Bar San Juan
description:
City: Chorlton
description: Attractive looking tapas bar which takes a leaf out of the Seville style. Superb reviews too. (Added December 2023)

name: Hospoda U Léni
description:
City: Úštěk
description: Charmingly stuck in time train station pub that has a fanbase through its honest clapped out character. (Added December 2023)

name: MIQT pub
description:
City: Prishtina
description: Pub in ' English style' with wood fittings and green walls, without being an over-done homage, ie a theme pub. It has its own flair and identity by the look of things and is very well rated. (Added January 2024)

name: The Gait Inn
description:
City: Millington
description: Splendid looking country pub combining a homely social interior with good grub, doesn't look like it has become a dining room just yet. (Added January 2024)

name: Le Garde Fou
description:
City: Strasbourg
description: Very typical Scandi-influenced craft beer bar. (Added January 2024)

name: Le Local
description:
City: Strasbourg
description: Colourful funky bar, well reviewed, good selection. Low-key steampunk theme. (Added January 2024)

name: La Mandragore
description:
City: Strasbourg
description: Atmospheric looking taxidermy strewn eclectic bar. Looks well worth a try. (Added January 2024)

name: Les Tricheurs - Bar à Jeux
description:
City: Strasbourg
description: Board game pub, intimate and cosy, down-to-earth with several beers on tap. (Added January 2024)

name: Le Schluch
description:
City: Strasbourg
description: Surviving old timer bierstub with wood strip walls and traditional Alsace offerings. Looks like a proper bar not a restaurant. (Added January 2024)

name: L'Alchimiste
description:
City: Strasbourg
description: Intriguing cocktail bar with a foresty, druid like theme, overall well-rated and certainly seems distinctive. (Added January 2024)

name: Bar Barberousse Strasbourg
description:
City: Strasbourg
description: Pirate themed cocktail bar with wood strip panelling and atmospheric surroundings. Mixed reviews but possibly worth having up your sleeve. (Added January 2024)

name: Maison citoyenne
description:
City: Strasbourg
description: Volunteer-led cultural centre that also provides a bar and outdoor seating, along with the usual events. Looks colourful and worth a try. (Added January 2024)

name: Brasserie Roue Libre - Brewpub
description:
City: Strasbourg
description: Brewpub with wide array of offerings and happy hour deals. Very well reviewed. Looks tastefully decorated. (Added January 2024)

name: Grow Bar
description:
City: Prague
description: A classic alternative cellar bar in brick vaults - casual hangout. Looks worth a try. (Added January 2024)

name: El Refugio café art nature - arte - bar
description:
City: Alicante
description: Poetry readings and live music at this popular cultural institution, low key and informal. Good reviews. (Added January 2024)

name: Birreria Art. 17
description:
City: Florence
description: Atmospheric beer specialists in live-in surroundings. Well reviewed and well worth a look. (Added January 2024)

name: Brauerei Hoh
description:
City: Köttensdorf
description: Old-school Franconian Brauereigaststatte with simple charms. Well reviewed. (Added January 2024)

name: Rose Of England
description:
City: Ramsgate
description: Interesting personalised High St pub with a hint of Victoriana about it. Decent ales, very well reviewed. (Added January 2024)

name: Lower Royal George Inn
description:
City: Pole Moor
description: Unspoilt pub with quite some appeal to it. Good reviews and on a bus route. (Added January 2024)

name: Malatesta
description:
City: Alicante
description: A city institution, worn in boozer/kneipe with plenty of characterful appeal. Still well reviewed. (Added January 2024)

name: House of Ales
description:
City: Pontefract
description: Bottle shop and micro-bar with some draft options which have popped up. Need to visit to see how viable it is as a drinking venue (Added January 2024)

name: The Red Cow
description:
City: Sandwich
description: Traditional beamed pub with a market town trade. Looks decent, but will need to try it to be sure. (Added January 2024)

name: The Swan
description:
City: Darlaston
description: Simple, social set up with a proper bar room in intimate space. Good ale selection. (Added January 2024)

name: Black Horse
description:
City: Thetford
description: A well rated traditional pub with usual low beams and familiar interior that does not look overly altered. Worth a try. (Added January 2024)

name: Alexandra Arms
description:
City: Kettering
description: Looks like a potential 9 or 10 out of 10 pub with a hugely characterful interior. Traditional in style but highly personalised. (Added January 2024)

name: The Banshee Labyrinth
description:
City: Edinburgh
description: A now famous bar with notable interior, still well rated today. Worth a look (Added January 2024)

name: Rosenauer Hofbräu
description:
City: Marktgraitz
description: Very pleasant brewpub in a cabin-like space, looks warm and social, opening hours are probably one to watch though. (Added January 2024)

name: U2 přátel
description:
City: Brno
description: Casual multi-tap hangout we enjoyed but not enough to tip the balance.

name: The Wally Dug
description:
City: Edinburgh
description: Set in a half-step basement in a mews, an interesting looking bar, classical in style but minimalist in approach. Strong reviews. (Added February 2024)

name: Old Bell Inn
description:
City: Edinburgh
description: Wooden boozer with exposed beams, studded leather bench seats and a 'proper boozer' character. Worth a look (Added February 2024)

name: The Butchers Arms
description:
City: Herne 
description: One of the original micropubs, highly personalised interior, good selection and brilliant reviews. (Added February 2024)

name: Les Sans Culottes
description:
City: Paris
description: Famous aging bar with a classical fin de siecle look. Foody but space for drinking. (Added February 2024)

name: The Chequers
description:
City: Swinford
description: Light brown wood panelling with old fashioned pub games and bench seating in a barn like space. (Added February 2024)

name: Country Bar
description:
City: Zermatt
description: Saloon bar with bunker-like interior and pub games, easily the closest to a pub you'll find around this area. (Added February 2024)

name: The Bricklayers Arms
description:
City: Hersham
description: Dressy heritage pub with Victorian prints and classical interior. Good ales. Well rated. (Added February 2024)

name: Royal Oak
description:
City: Whatlington
description: Old fashioned pub with inglenook fireplace, low beams and rustic surroundings, a little foody of course, but seems to be space for socialising. Highly rated. (Added February 2024)

name: Teuchters
description:
City: Edinburgh
description: It didn't quite do enough on our visit however it's a pleasant traditional local in a quieter neighbourhood, with fireplace and candle light. (Added February 2024)

name: The Bowlers Rest
description:
City: Leith
description: Free House. Traditional neighbourhood pub with red cushioned upholstered seats, pool and darts, with some interesting drinks too - large Bourbon selection, Ayinger on tap and affordable snacks and pub grub. Excellent reviews (Added February 2024)

name: The Tourmalet
description:
City: Edinburgh
description: Sister pub to the Ventoux, Tour de France themed bar with selection of European beers. (Added February 2024)

name: Cloisters Bar
description:
City: Edinburgh
description: Part of a former church, repurposed into a nice looking bar with dark wood, beams, stained glass along with a good selection of beers. (Added February 2024)

name: Kerttulin Kievari
description:
City: Turku
description: Whisky specialists with some beer alternatives in an intimate space. It was an interesting place with a neighbourly feel, but didn't quite cut it on our visit. Worth keeping in mind though. (Added February 2024)

name: Pub Sirdie
description:
City: Helsinki
description: Looks like a brilliant knackered out old boozer with worn wood booths and highly personalised interior, a mixed crowd including younger audience. (Added February 2024)

name: Pub Magneetti Vallila
description:
City: Helsinki
description: Fun-looking colourful affair, well reviewed. (Added February 2024)

name: Bar Molotow
description:
City: Helsinki
description: Decent enough looking eclectic spot. (Added February 2024)

name: Majava Baari
description:
City: Helsinki
description: Characterful punky hangout, The Beaver Bar. (Added February 2024)

name: John Scott's Arkadia
description:
City: Helsinki
description: Happy hour Mon-Fri 2-6 – English themed pub. (Added February 2024)

name: Kalevan Krouvi
description:
City: Helsinki
description: old fashioned, warm glowing little bunker, looks alright! (Added February 2024)

name: Pub Heinähattu
description:
City: Helsinki
description: Small crustpunk bar, looks worth a try. (Added February 2024)

name: Pyynikin Brewhouse
description:
City: Tampere
description: A decent enough option for those into brewpubs, with a fairly pubby bar room. (Added March 2024)

name: Majava Baari Beaver Bar
description:
City: Tampere
description: Punk/rock pub - we were too early to sample when it is most likely at its best, but some decent raw materials. (Added March 2024)

name: Pub Golden Monkey
description:
City: Hervanta
description: Multitap neighbourhood pub combining good beer with a casual, dive bar type hangout with TV, games, etc. It was decent but didn't blow us away. (Added March 2024)

name: Patschifig
description:
City: Basel
description: Aka Hafechas. Funky repurposed space with sprawling semi-ruin bar type vibes. (Added March 2024)

name: Rio
description:
City: Basel
description: Presszo style funky bar with a continental European flavour and sense of institution to it. A bit café like during the day but seems to work later on too. Didn't quite push into an inscription but it wasn't far off, and we'll be back (Added March 2024)

name: The Hop Poles
description:
City: Brighton
description: Effective looking pub with superior beer selection and breweriana on the walls. Well reviewed. (Added March 2024)

name: Tokaj Wine Bar
description:
City: Budapest
description: Surviving Borozo, working class wine bar. No beer available - but that fact is a good thing, and shows the complete commitment to the style. Superb reviews. (Added March 2024)

name: Zeiglhaus Parkstein e.V.
description:
City: Parkstein
description: Zoigl brewing revival along with food preparation and baking. A rare venture, one that is also membership based. Extremely limited opening hours. Open Thursdays 6-10pm (Added March 2024)

name: Pivovarská hospůdka
description:
City: Kounice
description: Traditional brewery restaurant pub with a hint of First Republic 'Hostinec' about it. Brewkit visible from the hatch. (Added March 2024)

name: Cafe Metro Bar
description:
City: Bilston
description: A town full of nice surprises, or at least, containing more than one nice surprise, it seems. Very well rated micro with the typical hanging hops and strong selection. (Added March 2024)

name: The Jenny Wren
description:
City: Beal
description: Some potential to this beamed old pub with fireplace, high backed benches and drinks focus. Live music, lunches. Some great reviews. (Added March 2024)

name: Irrsinn Bar
description:
City: Basel
description: Well-reviewed gloomy low-lit bar. Live music, table football, pinball, cocktails etc. Intriguing spot. (Added March 2024)

name: Zum Urigen Raucherkneipe
description:
City: Freiburg
description: Backstreet kneipe in unlikely house with a pleasant garden and rustic interior, very well review. Raucher indicates smoking, so be warned. (Added March 2024)

name: Alt Freiburg
description:
City: Freiburg
description: No-frills local life in a pubby interior. (Added March 2024)

name: BAR am Funkeneck - Freiburg im Breisgau
description:
City: Freiburg
description: Craft beers in a neighbourhood hangout, looks a bit of a kiezkneipe type thing, smoking allowed - be warned. (Added March 2024)

name: Alter Simon
description:
City: Freiburg
description: Corner wood-fit raucherkneipe with Kolsch on tap. Closed Sundays. (Added March 2024)

name: Brasserie Zum Braunen Mutz
description:
City: Basel
description: Central beer hall with familiar interior tarted up with a striking ceiling panel, bears and Carnival themes. 8 Feldschlosschen beers on tap, a good Schwemme although the Ausschenk is a wasted opportunity, overly bland. (Added March 2024)

name: Sauerbratenpalast
description:
City: Aachen
description: Old fashioned Gaststatte specialising in Sauerbraten, wood-strip interior, women-owned and run, careful with the opening hours. All signs point to the fact there is space to turn up just for a drink. (Added March 2024)

name: The Crafty Baa Keswick
description:
City: Keswick
description: Bric-a-brac strewn micro with a good reputation. (Added March 2024)

name: Fungo's Bar
description:
City: Salzburg
description: Intimate bar with great reviews, looks pretty cosy. Worth a peek through the door at least. (Added March 2024)

name: Wahn´s Inn 2.0
description:
City: Passau
description: Finally somewhere of interest in Passau that isn't a pub-restaurant. Proper hangout. CLOSED SUNDAY :( (Added March 2024)

name: Batavia Pilsstube
description:
City: Passau
description: Extraordinary kitsch here, but be aware opening hours are unusual. Excellent reviews. (Added March 2024)

name: Pub U Johanna
description:
City: Jihlava
description: A nice lived in, unspoilt old hospoda, well reviewed. (Added March 2024)

name: Bambus Bar
description:
City: Znojmo
description: Basement cocktail bar with a lively crowd, nothing too pretentious, just nice brick vaults, relaxed surroundings and town life. For a provincial place we were quite impressed. Bordering on an inclusion. (April 2024)

name: Hospůdka za pecí
description:
City: Sedlec-Prčice
description: Popular rural pub with some home-spun charms, very well rated and comes highly recommended. (Added April 2024)

name: Pivnice U Míče
description:
City: Brno
description: A persistently well-rated pub known for its Czech tapas and good beers. Interior didn't seem all that much to us but it must be about the social atmosphere when it gets going. We'll try next time. (Added April 2024)

name: turandot bar
description:
City: Berlin
description: Superb looking characterful battered old kiezkneipe decorated with local art. Well rated too. (Added April 2024)

name: Le Palais Du Houblon
description:
City: Nivelles
description: Characterful looking basement complex with curved and arched ceilings and different rooms to explore, beer selection looks, of course, superior. (Added April 2024)

name: Wachtel söröző
description:
City: Ófalu
description: Iconic old time village pub highly recommend by Kocsma tourist (Hungarian pub specialists) - well rated. (Added April 2024)

name: Két Korsó
description:
City: Budapest
description: Battered old corner hangout with attractive bar. Appearance and vibe of a Berlin corner kneipe. Worth a look. (Added April 2024)

name: Egri Borozó Borbarát Bár Galéria
description:
City: Debrecen
description: Fantastic homely, unchanged pub focusing on wine and homecooked food. Superb reviews and it's easy to see why. (Added April 2024)

name: Zsír (Fővárosi Kulipintyó)
description:
City: Budapest
description: Seems well worth a try - battered bunker with wood strip curved ceiling, exceptional reviews. (Added April 2024)

name: Giero Pub
description:
City: Budapest
description: Cult pub with Hungarian folk music and spartan, alternative surroundings. Be aware that this is seen as a tourist trap because the prices are hidden/high but you are in effect paying for the live music performance and in that context the prices seem entirely acceptable. (Added April 2024)

name: Aranyeső espresso
description:
City: Budapest
description: Super looking worn-in, battered old pub.  Pool table and very retro surroundings. (Added April 2024)

name: Villány-Siklósi borozó
description:
City: Budapest
description: Fantastic looking place, a down-to-earth, lived-in drop in bar, unpretentious and right in the heart of the action. Well reviewed too. (Added April 2024)

name: Kis Kurt Borozo
description:
City: Budapest
description: One of the few surviving Budapest borozos. Retro atmosphere, highly personalised and very well reviewed. (Added April 2024)

name: Magán vasút gyűjtemény
description:
City: Pusztakettős
description: A near legendary village pub by a lake with extraordinary labour of love interior featuring train heritage. (Added April 2024)

name: Hintaló Iszoda
description:
City: Budapest
description: Popular antiquey style bar with a versatility - cocktails but decent fridge of beers and relaxed atmosphere. Very well rated. (Added April 2024)

name: Petz Söröző
description:
City: Székesfehérvár
description: Instantly superb looking pub with personalised interior, great social scene and nice terrace too. Reviews are exceptional. (Added April 2024)

name: The Wheatsheaf Inn
description:
City: Borrowby
description: Lovely classical village pub with big fireplace, low ceilings, homely interior and all that you're looking for from such a venue. Exceptional reviews too. (Added April 2024)

name: The Goyt Inn
description:
City: Whaley Bridge
description: Rustic Pennines pub with attractive homely interior, fireplace, the works. The reviews would seem to suggest this is well worth visiting. (Added April 2024)

name: Czeska Baszta
description:
City: Warsaw
description: Traditional pub with Czech beers - not just the usual ones. (Added April 2024)

name: Na Mlýnku
description:
City: Humpolec
description: The best of Humpolec's otherwise rather drab bar options. Modern and overly brightly lit, which drags down what is otherwise a really atmospheric place with a vibrant social scene, with top class Bernard beer on tap. If we lived here we'd be here all the time due to an absence of good alternatives, but as we don't, it is only a tentative suggestion at this stage. Perhaps it may win us over on our return. (Added April 2024)

name: Bar Pub LITTLE BASTARDD
description:
City: Prague
description: Late bar (verging on Herna bar) with a dive bar/scuzz feel, motorbike decorations, pinball machine US ephemera, possibly a little like Bondy Bar in Holesovice. Worth a look for sure. (Added April 2024)

name: Za větrem
description:
City: Prague
description: Surviving "Fourth grade" pub, a very well rated one too on account for how they look after the beer and the good service. Looks reasonably characterful and a bit of a throwback with socialist-era and football decor. Reportedly very cheap prices. As of 2024, 33kc for Staropramen 10. (Added April 2024)

name: Bar Celler La Massana
description:
City: Barcelona
description: An authentic neighbourhood Bodega that's super popular for its democratic prices, good hearty cooking and local character as yet undimmed, owing to being located slightly further off the beaten path. We enjoyed the visit, especially the food, but perhaps the interior itself could do more to win us over, a little plain in the main room, but there is a characterful row of barrels in the entrance. (Added April 2024)

name: Bodega La Palma
description:
City: Barcelona
description: Classic patrician Bodega with high ceilings, big vats, tiles, hanging meat, etc. Still very popular and well rated for the area. (Added April 2024)

name: Rispa Cervesers
description:
City: Girona
description: Microbrewery open Fridays & Saturdays. (Added May 2024)

name: Eksperyment
description:
City: Lublin
description: Funky, colourful hangout with something distinctive to offer. Well reviewed. (Added May 2024)

name: Szalon kocsma
description:
City: Makó
description: A cute little chalet staffed irregularly by an elderly team. Looks quite unusual and information is thin on the ground, but surely worth a try if you're in the area! (Added May 2024)

name: Mini Oázis Söröző
description:
City: Budapest
description: Characterful roadside boozer with a personalised touch and very good reviews. (Added May 2024)

name: Casa Agustín
description:
City: Zaragoza
description: Characterful 'institution' bodega with all the typical features you'd come to expect. (Added May 2024)

name: The Hyde Park
description:
City: Plymouth
description: Extremely characterful, personalised neighbourhood boozer that looks worth a try! (Added May 2024)

name: Kazoo Art Pub
description:
City: Szada
description: A lovely, homely and artful hangout with a Presszo vibe, with some live music too. Uniformly well reviewed. (Added May 2024)

name: The Hop Monkey Music Bar @ Dean Clough
description:
City: Halifax 
description: Open later in the week, a down to earth venue offering craft beer, live music and evening hangouts. (Added May 2024)

name: "A kocsma" Hangulat bortár,sörtár, könyvtár
description:
City: Budapest
description: Personalised woodstrip saloon bar with heavy decoration and atmospheric evening interior. Exceptional reviews. (Added May 2024)

name: Antic Teatre
description:
City: Barcelona
description: Cultural event space and bar that looks quite interesting, although very centrally located. (Added May 2024)

name: La Masia
description:
City: Barcelona
description: Classic unspoilt Bodega, dating back to the 1950s. Very well rated, surely worth a try. (Added May 2024)

name: Resolis
description:
City: Barcelona
description: Historic bar that has been given a very tasteful, if upmarket facelift. There is still casual space and it looked vibrant when we passed. Well rated too. (Added May 2024)

name: Mülä Baar
description:
City: Tartu
description: Off-beat wine bar with an eclectic interior, perhaps a little towards towny but interesting enough to be atmospheric at least. Worth a try. Excellent reviews. (Added May 2024)

name: Barlova
description:
City: Tartu
description: Among the near extinct breed of suburban pubs, this is a characterful, social and down-to-earth drinking hole attracting a range of ages, well-lived. Looks a must-visit. (Added May 2024)

name: Pivnice u Ryby
description:
City: Bystřice pod Hostýnem 
description: Characterful and almost off-the-map village pub worth a look for unspoilt charm. (Added May 2024)

name: Blues tanya
description:
City: Érd
description: Superb looking wooden tavern with pleasant garden for live music and casual hangouts, Superb reviews attest to that. (Added May 2024)

name: Szent János Retro szórakozóhely söröző és közösségi ház
description:
City: Velence
description: A surprising find, almost a museum with collection of retro artefacts decorating the pub. Well reviewed. (Added May 2024)

name: Bodega Cal Pep
description:
City: Barcelona
description: Not to be mistaken with Bodegueta Cal Pep in Sants. A historic Bodega with a personal character and plenty of identity. Fabulous reviews too. Looks unmissable - shame we missed it! (Added May 2024)

name: BAR BODEGA MONTSE
description:
City: Barcelona
description: Incredible looking historic Bodega on Barcelona's protected cultural heritage list. How we missed it, I'll never know. Great reviews. Go for it! (Added May 2024)

name: Bar Del Toro
description:
City: Barcelona
description: Characterful, well-reviewed Bodega on Barcelona's protected cultural heritage list. Seems worth a look! (Added May 2024)

name: Moll de Rebaix
description:
City: Barcelona
description: Friendly, characterful, homely and personalised bodega with good reviews. Seems well worth a try. (Added May 2024)

name: Bodega Celler Miquel - Vermut, vino y tapas en Barcelona
description:
City: Barcelona
description: Very characterful and well reviewed historic bodega on Barcelona's list of protected cultural heritage. Worth a look! (Added May 2024)

name: Bodega Casas
description:
City: Barcelona
description: Although the interior falls into good rather than great the fact this is on Barcelona's list of protected Bodegas as part of cultural heritage, and the superb reviews, give much encouragement to visit. (Added May 2024)

name: Bar Bodega Quimet
description:
City: Barcelona
description: Not to be confused with 'Quimet + Quimet' in Poble-Sec district. On Barcelona's list of protected cultural heritage. Superb characterful and historic interior with great reviews. (Added May 2024)

name: BODEGA LLUÍS
description:
City: Barcelona
description: Listed as protected cultural heritage, a historic Bodega with some remaining character and ritual to the operation. Looks worth a try with a personalised bar area and wall of wines. (Added May 2024)

name: Bodega Sopena
description:
City: Barcelona
description: Fantastic looking little bodega, a one room set up with upturned barrels and straightforward operation. On Barcelona's protected cultural heritage list. A must visit. (Added May 2024)

name: Bodega J. Cala
description:
City: Barcelona
description: An utter classic by the look of it. Traditional bodega with character, personality and history, inscribed on Barcelona's protected cultural heritage list. Very enthusiastic and positive reviews. Unmissable. (Added May 2024)

name: Jungle Taverne
description:
City: Carcassonne
description: Funky, lively and tiny bar with craft beer and a small terrace on the street. Let down by unnecessary disco lighting during the day, a green strobe effect you really don't want. It crams a lot in a small space, and worked better in the evening, but was really just off the cusp of an inclusion. Still, if you're in town you'll find this is pretty much the only place to go that isn't an Irish pub. (Added June 2024)

name: Radio City
description:
City: Valencia
description: From 1979, this is a well-known and very popular place, so it remains to be seen if that has taken the edge off the experience somewhat. However, a colourful interior and cultural program suggests there is plenty still to explore. (Added May 2024)

name: La Rovira
description:
City: Barcelona
description: Popular low key drop in bar in Gracia which has a good line in craft beer, but manages to be likeably informal and neighbourly by the looks of things. Decorated with retro 50s and 60s fittings in places, but a light touch. (Added May 2024)

name: Bar Vinil
description:
City: Barcelona
description: A fairly warm, cosy, homely and personalised low key, casual hangout bar. Looks worth a try! (Added May 2024)

name: 14 De La Rosa
description:
City: Barcelona
description: Stunning looking bar, modern but warmly lit, fittings influenced by 1970s modernism, a hint of retro. Extremely good reviews. (Added May 2024)

name: Café 1900
description:
City: Maastricht
description: Characterful café with some classic retro lighting and bruin kroege setup, Very well reviewed. Seems worth a try! (Added May 2024)

name: Café 't Haantje
description:
City: Maastricht
description: As yet unspoilt bruine kroege, good reviews and clearly worth a look for its characterful interior with classic signage. (Added May 2024)

name: Café 't Rozenhoedje
description:
City: Maastricht
description: A fairly unspoilt looking bruine kroege with typical characterful interior, maybe worth a look in. (Added May 2024)

name: Maison blanche
description:
City: Toulouse
description: Jazz bar with atmospheric, intimate interior. (Added May 2024)

name: The Hopscotch Pub & Brewery
description:
City: Toulouse
description: Scottish pub but fairly muted on the tacky theme stuff, looks a decent trad tavern. Open every day from 4pm. It didn't quite tip the balance on our visit, but the beer selection was good and it's one of the best bars around the Capitole. (Added May 2024)

name: Le Ravelin
description:
City: Toulouse
description: Bar for live music, punk type aesthetic, cheap prices, in-the-know kind of place. (Added May 2024)

name: La Passerelle Negreneys
description:
City: Toulouse
description: Culture/community café for good causes and social projects, looks interesting enough to pop by. Acts as a de facto brewery tap for Aviateur nearby. Our visit went as expected. On events nights this will be a cool place to go, but during the day it's simply a friendly café run by good people. Fair prices. (Added June 2024)

name: Le Grabuge
description:
City: Perpignan
description: Microbrewery with a certain ad-hoc appeal and loungey furniture. Very well reviewed. (Added May 2024)

name: Hospůdka Radioklub
description:
City: Havirov
description: Estate pub with rotating guest craft beers and super-low prices, with a throwback atmosphere. Hence not for everyone. (Added May 2024)

name: Bar Pelikán
description:
City: Ostrava
description: Intriguing venue, very small little pajzl with incredible reviews, rustic interior. Opens 4pm til late. (Added May 2024)

name: Décapsule Club
description:
City: Toulouse
description: Bottleshop bar with 10+ taps and walls of specialist beers. It didn't quite tip the balance as a bar experience but it deserves a side-recommendation, particularly if you're looking for a beer near the main station. (Added June 2024)

name: La Houblonnière
description:
City: Toulouse
description: Craft beer and cider bottle shop, narrow with a bar room to the rear making it a full bar rather than a shop. It didn't quite tip the balance overall for a full guide recommendation but it's worth bearing in mind, particularly if you're crossing Pont Neuf and fancy somewhere to hangout. (Added June 2024)

name: Pivní klub U Dobráků
description:
City: Ostrava
description: For those who enjoy a rough and ready experience, almost a museum to the old times. Weird ramshackle dive with primary school style murals, masked dummy in the front window, Ostravar on tap for not much money, and a cast of unabashed regulars who may be surprised to see you but you may find yourself having a greater welcome than you first expect. Don't bother going here if the idea of this is intimidating. It isn't a guide entry but as a curio, and a conveniently located pub near the station, it's worth keeping in mind (Added October 2024)

name: Café de la Ostrava
description:
City: Ostrava
description: Must visit venue for interior design, steampunk influence. A bar/club with some weed for sale, but regular drinks available. Closed when we tried to visit in October 2024 but at that point there were recent reviews, so who knows?

(Added June 2024)

name: Club Music Bazar
description:
City: Ostrava
description: Locally famous events venue, live music and radio station coming at things from a less commercial angle. Looks lived in and characterful, but how much is a bar and how much is a performance space is something we'll have to explore first hand. (Added June 2024)

name: The Globe
description:
City: Liverpool
description: Compact traditional boozer known for its sloping floor. Didn't quite make the cut due to a lack of distinctiveness otherwise but it is cosy and social. (Added June 2024)

name: Forgó Söröző
description:
City: Dunabogdány
description: A pleasantly pubby looking kocsma type cabin hangout, with a local cult reputation. (Added June 2024)

name: Sarki kocsma
description:
City: Madocsa
description: Something of a shrine to a Hungarian footballer. A culture club with some wood fittings. Info thin on the ground but reportedly a cult venue. (Added June 2024)

name: The Crows Nest
description:
City: Crosby
description: Unspoilt side-street boozer that seems to have retained its character. Good reviews. (Added June 2024)

name: The Circ
description:
City: Burnley
description: Retro-nostalgic bar with interesting decor and furnishing. Very well reviewed. (Added June 2024)

name: The Bridge Bier Huis
description:
City: Burnley
description: Continental beer, craft keg and real ales at this decent looking ale house, slightly modernised but offset with some personalised decor. Well reviewed, looks worth a try at least. (Added June 2024)

name: The Lamb Inn
description:
City: Holymoorside
description: A very pleasant, rustic country pub with unspoilt interior, very good reviews. Real ales. (Added June 2024)

name: La Pécora
description:
City: Burgos
description: Looks like an absolute classic. Bunker drinking den with wood fittings, highly personalised and 'lived-in', huge record collection. Very well reviewed. (Added June 2024)

name: Old Royal Oak
description:
City: Dublin
description: Popular and extremely well reviewed traditional pub with comfy seating and personalised exterior. Looks well worth a try. (Added June 2024)

name: Diófa söröző
description:
City: Nagymaros
description: Looks like a stunning rustic saloon bar with collection of old radios and farming equipment, certainly well off the radar, but worth a look if in the area. Exceptional reviews. (Added June 2024)

name: Bar Maurizio
description:
City: Bologna
description: Classic old-timer bar, highly personalised and lived in, set under the porticos. Looks superb. (Added June 2024)

name: Sezon
description:
City: Lublin
description: Courtyard bar overshadowed by tall trees and galleried historic buildings. Looks very nice. (Added June 2024)

name: The Live and Let Live, Neen Sollars
description:
City: Neen Sollars
description: Traditional unspoilt rural pub with lots of the typical classic features, bolstered by its good reviews. (Added June 2024)

name: The Cherry Tree
description:
City: Leicester
description: Mixed reviews but it looks worth popping by. A traditional backstreet ale house, still family-run. (Added June 2024)

name: Shakespeare's Head
description:
City: London
description: An unspoilt must-visit, with traditional characterful interior and lived-in feel. Highly rated too. (Added June 2024)

name: Малкия Интер
description:
City: Veliko Tarnovo
description: Malkia Inter, by Bulgaria's standards a quirky highly personalised venue that seems well worth a look. Good reviews. (Added June 2024)

name: Cabardouche
description:
City: Antwerp
description: Brewery with pleasant leafy looking venue, very popular and well reviewed. (Added June 2024)

name: The Store
description:
City: Luxembourg
description: Friendly and cosy looking bottleshop with warm hues and a loungey feel. Excellent reviews. (Added June 2024)

name: The Salisbury Hotel (Harringay)
description:
City: London
description: Restored art nouveau interior makes this one worth heading out to. (Added June 2024)

name: Vinotéka Výčep Jihomoravských vín
description:
City: Prague
description: One of the few remaining family-run Vinárnas in the city, looks personalised and worth a look. (Added June 2024)

name: Hanspaulský bar U Hřebíka
description:
City: Prague
description: A little half-basement low key rustic hangout in a supposedly posh area. Very well reviewed. (Added June 2024)

name: Hospoda ,Hajzlík'
description:
City: Prague
description: By all accounts a completely unreconstructed dive bar, which, if that is your thing, may be of interest! (Added June 2024)

name: Pivnice V Zápolí
description:
City: Prague
description: Tucked away little boozer with a lightly farm/rustic based decoration, drinks focused. (Added June 2024)

name: Sala Gestalguinos
description:
City: Valencia
description: Very appealing looking venue, a traditional taberna layout with niches and original fittings, but these days a performance venue too. (Added June 2024)

name: Kaf Cafè
description:
City: Valencia
