description: Personalised friendly hangout, bookish café with events and live music, worth a try if in the area. (Added June 2024)

name: Cervecería Aquarium
description:
City: Valencia
description: Boat themed tapas bar with some original fittings by the look of it, seems worth a look for the novelty factor. Reviews for food, service, etc vary. On our first visit it was very much the institution venue but didn't quite make the cut. Still, some of you may wish to give it a try. (Added June 2024)

name: Pub Down Monkey Business
description:
City: Valencia
description: One for fans of cocktails and quirky décor, reviews vary on account of indifferent service and expense, but overall looks worth passing by, particularly given it is in the market hall. (Added June 2024)

name: Refugiarte Bar cultural
description:
City: Valencia
description: Live music and some personalised homely decor. Great reviews. Possibly worth dropping by to see what's going on. (Added June 2024)

name: Negresco English Pub
description:
City: Valencia
description: Although ostensibly a theme pub, the tat seems at a respectable minimum and this does look well put together and far more interesting than the 5 million identical corner café bars in the city. Well reviewed. (Added June 2024)

name: Praga Valencia
description:
City: Valencia
description: Slight long shot but a pubby bar that can't seem to decide if it's Irish or Prague themed, but serves European beers anyway. Looks fairly social and a change from the norm. (Added June 2024)

name: Tŷ Coch Inn
description:
City: Morfa Nefyn
description: Special coastal pub with homely interior. Popular venue but not spoilt yet. (Added July 2024)

name: Czeska Piviarnia
description:
City: Warsaw
description: Tidy and homely little holdout for Czech beers poured Czech style. Well reviewed. (Added July 2024)

name: Tafarn Y Glôb
description:
City: Bangor
description: Characterful and homely backstreet boozer that won't be to everyone's taste but is distinctive, personalised and worth a look. Well reviewed. (Added July 2024)

name: The Swan
description:
City: Huntington
description: Information online thin on the ground but there have been recent visits on social media. Throwback rural inn with eccentric operation, supposedly. (Added July 2024)

name: The Railway
description:
City: North Tawton
description: Must-visit traditional ex-station pub with wood fittings and traditional furnishings. Superb reviews. (Added July 2024)

name: Jan Pavlík - Restaurace Na Nádraží
description:
City: České Velenice
description: Iconic heritage station pub with grand interior from the inter-war period, while in typically Czech fashion, everything from the eye level down is post-war. Well reviewed, a pilgrimage site for train station enthusiasts and station pub tickers. (Added July 2024)

name: Gaststätte Willi Mangler
description:
City: Berlin
description: Looks like a quality pub and meeting spot, very well reviewed. Dark, cosy interior, tactically lit. (Added July 2024)

name: Badenscher Hof
description:
City: Berlin
description: Interesting, atmospheric looking bar with occasional live gigs, a communal feel. Homely rather than traditional or modern. Well reviewed. (Added July 2024)

name: Fasanen 47
description:
City: Berlin
description: Superbly atmospheric looking old timer cocktail + whiskey bar with muted lighting, wood and leather. Traditional rather than modern. Exceptionally well reviewed. (Added July 2024)

name: Menta
description:
City: Berlin
description: Atmospheric, shady, candlelit venue straddling both a bohemian antique hangout spot and a true boozer. Well reviewed. (Added July 2024)

name: Academia Club Ghetto
description:
City: Split
description: A casual knockabout pub with live music, courtyard, bohemian atmosphere, relaxed crowd. (Added July 2024)

name: BackStage Bar Pub Zadar
description:
City: Zadar
description: Neighbourhood pub with atmospheric terrace in the evening, some music (piano/guitar leanings) inside and friendly service. Interior a little trite overall on our first visit but in a city short on options such as Zadar well worth considering. (Added August 2024)

name: Brlog craft beer bar & shop
description:
City: Zadar
description: Craft beer taproom with atmospheric terrace, sit in familiar industrial estate surroundings. Closed on our one and only attempt to visit. (Added August 2024)

name: Muro bar
description:
City: Zadar
description: Cocktail bar with a woodstrip chalet type interior and views of the harbour. A little more going on than the average. Didn't quite reach the threshold on our visit in 2024 but wasn't far off. Worth a look. (Added August 2024)

name: Deja Brew Pub Zadar
description:
City: Zadar
description: A solid option for central Zadar with superior beer selection and a familiar pubby layout. A little samey when compared to Europe's overall offerings but for Croatia, particularly Zadar, quite clearly superior so worth bearing in mind. (Added August 2024)

name: Screws & Beers
description:
City: Split
description: Neighbourhood craft beer bar with a local feel. The interior is too generic sadly (by European standards, by Croatian standards it has some effort applied), but the drinks are good, the atmosphere is friendly and for beer specialists this will be on the list to try. For us, we'd need to go back a few more times to give it a chance to cross the threshold. (Added August 2024)

name: Baraka BBQ & Brew Bar
description:
City: Split
description: Surprisingly pricey bar considering it is nowhere close to the old town, and mainly for locals. Modern, big budget operation with state of the art lines and a broad beer selection. Covers bases well, but perhaps lacks a loveability. Beer specialists will need to pay a visit nevertheless. (Added August 2024)

name: Mieux Ici Qu'en Face
description:
City: Dieppe
description: Agreeable dockside café bar with strong beer selection, retro furnishings, tiled floor and very homely looking. Excellent reviews. (Added August 2024)

name: The Carew Arms
description:
City: Crowcombe
description: Pleasant looking rural Inn with some original features present, skittle alley, rustic furnishings. Odd shaped building and a little foody, so would have to visit to see for sure. (Added August 2024)

name: The Cider House (Monkey house)
description:
City: Defford
description: A legendary venue for cider drinkers. Served from a hatch in a thatched cottage, the real cider is the draw, but a most pleasing rural setting + garden to drink in too. Exceptionally well rated. (Added August 2024)

name: Café De Ooievaar
description:
City: Rotterdam
description: Another old port brown café worth a look. Very well rated and most of the typical Dutch features appear to be in place, if in a larger venue than some. (Added August 2024)

name: Brasserie (Beerhouse)
description:
City: Jūrmala
description: Excellent rustic looking stopoff with hanging hops and a homely setting. Beer specialists. Excellent reviews. (Added August 2024)

name: Hostinec U Koňa
description:
City: Hodonin
description: A typical Czech hospoda with some good beer from Mazak, local life in situ very much from what we can work out. Needs a closer look to be sure though. (Added August 2024)

name: Szimpla
description:
City: Sfântu Gheorghe
description: An absolutely bizarre but committed attempt to recreate the iconic Szimpla Kert in provincial Romania. Worth a look for that alone, I'd have thought. (Added August 2024)

name: Csarnavölgyi Söröző
description:
City: Kemence
description: Excellent ratings for this rustic tavern, more a Kocsma than a Söröző from appearances, but they all count. Farming tools line the walls, the garden area looks pretty too. (Added August 2024)

name: Maki Büfé
description:
City: Tass
description: Excellent looking drop in bar with wood strip walls and dozens of fishing rods attached to the ceiling. Fish is of course on offer to eat here. Well rated too. (Added August 2024)

name: Kripta Söröző
description:
City: Budapest
description: Gothic kitsch, so that depends on your mileage - we love it from time to time, so interested to try this place out. Well rated too. (Added August 2024)

name: Park Presszó
description:
City: Heves
description: Roadside stop off, retro appeal inside with woodstrip walls, personalised interior and unpretentious approach. Very well rated. (Added August 2024)

name: Lipa
description:
City: Rimavská Sobota
description: Local's hangout, so much so it may put off the nervous. Ignore the very small pool of negative reviews as this is clearly going to be a love/hate place. Unmodernised interior, old folk sipping beer, exposed wood and quite a characterful looking interior too. (Added August 2024)

name: Guriga Söröző
description:
City: Budapest
description: A really well done looking pub with bar billiards, darts, warm lighting, wood fittings and personalised interior. Very good reviews. (Added August 2024)

name: The Spyglass Inn
description:
City: Ventnor
description: Essential visit, quirky pub with some distinctive original features and smuggler's cove style nautical nik-naks. (Added August 2024)

name: The Crispin
description:
City: Great Longstone
description: Characterful and homely pub with soft furnishings and distinctive decoration such as the selection of mugs on the ceiling. Well rated too. (Added August 2024)

name: Möku
description:
City: Tartu
description: Alternative bar with artistic interior and appealing courtyard. Good selection of beers here too. (Added August 2024)

name: Hrabal Söröző Békéscsaba
description:
City: Békéscsaba
description: One of a number of such named pubs around the country, it serves good Czech beer in a hospoda-like surrounding. This one is extremely well rated and surely worth a look if in the area. (Added August 2024)

name: Queens Arms
description:
City: Brixham
description: Very appealing ale house with retro signage and homely interior. Looks like a minor classic. Superb reviews. (Added August 2024)

name: Panama Söröző
description:
City: Székesfehérvár
description: Step back in time to this retro boozer next to tower blocks, somewhat unchanged appearance.

Tamás Puska, an intrepid local guide has this much to say:

"The second stop of our Székesfehérvár pub tour. Beyond Bakter, exiting the train station building, among the three-story apartment buildings, a small block with painted walls immediately calls out for attention, and how well it does, because it is also a pub, and a very cozy one at that, where Borsodi on tap is the hit today, despite the close days. , from which it is worth asking - at other times and for others - with pikolo. On the tiny terrace, we ourselves become the characters of the wall painting. Eternal companions here are the five hard-working men standing by the butt-high slatted fence with beer mugs, plus the four sitting on the terrace roof who seem to be eternal and never stop discussing the affairs of the world. However, if they were to cross the threshold beyond the circle of beer lamps of Velkopopvicky Panama, they would see the visceral pub romance, the small press tables in the room paneled from the roof to the stone floor, the smiling old posters on the walls such as "Every house should have Diana salted wine" and "Drown the beer in beer Your Sprite!", and of course the bartender herself, the woman, the host, who seems interested in the stories of travelers like us. Ferenc Czinki mentions it in his book of mini-short stories: A Pub City: "In order to understand Panama and the Railway Region, we must first understand the 1950s." Then he adds: "The Panama mystery is only further complicated by the small addition that the students of the nearby high school, the people of Vasváris, called the three pubs, Hungária, Gomba, and of course the pub tour that includes Panama, not without good reason triangle." Let's say I would be much more interested in why Panama itself was named that way? I didn't get an answer to that. But if I start from the fact that the term "Panamaization" dates back to 1893, when the financial abuses surrounding the construction of the Panama Canal turned into a political scandal and was born in connection with the related lawsuit, as a synonym for corruption and fraud, it suggests something , which I don't see, but if this is true, this place will never disappear from the big Hungarian pub map. Health!"

(Added August 2024)

name: Klub Vittula
description:
City: Budapest
description: Unclear how this bar passed us by after so many years, but it did. Grungy, but colourful cellar hangout with plenty of character and personalisation. (Added August 2024)

name: The Hind
description:
City: Musbury
description: Fairly homely looking village freehouse with real ales. Very well reviewed. A standout in that area, it seems. (Added August 2024)

name: Bar Bohemienne
description:
City: Trieste
description: Traditional tavern with exposed beams and a homely fee, beer focused too. Well reviewed. (Added August 2024)

name: Robin Hood
description:
City: Valencia
description: As far as theme Irish/English pubs go, they have to go the extra mile to reach our radar. After all, you don't travel thousands of miles just to get what you have back home. However, this looks like a pretty good effort with a character of its own too. Well rated. (Added August 2024)

name: Korona Kisvendéglő
description:
City: Budapest
description: A true surviving classic. Dive bar for locals with a personalised interior and link to the past. Be on your best behaviour, learn a few phrases before entering. Very well rated. (Added August 2024)

name: The Mateo's Drink Bar
description:
City: Budapest
description: A superb looking whisky club with booth seating, warm/gold hues. Down to earth also. Exceptional ratings. (Added August 2024)

name: Jaromír '68 Sörbisztró
description:
City: Budapest
description: Czech beer at this half-step basement hangout. Wood strip with a clear hospoda style setup. Dudak and similar beers from that stable (Pivovar Strakonice) available. Excellent reviews. (Added August 2024)

name: Joe's Kneipe
description:
City: Hohn am Berg,
description: Cult local rock pub with very little else to go on other than reviews, seemingly little information they wish to public. Exceptional reviews. The only way to know for sure is to try! (Added August 2024)

name: Konoba - Naša mala klinika
description:
City: Sveti Filip i Jakov,
description: Fantastic looking personalised old school boozer. Village wine and home made brandy. (Added August 2024)

name: Hospůdka a penzion Sauna
description:
City: Ostravice
description: Woodstrip chalet with good food and traditional country interior. Well reviewed. (Added August 2024)

name: Hostinec u Buroně Mexiko
description:
City: Mexiko
description: Village pub from the old school whose distinguishing feature is an alarming number of mounted hunting trophies (antlers, etc), with great reviews for the pub as a whole. (Added August 2024)

name: PIVNICE PODKOVA
description:
City: Karviná
description: Homely looking pub with a big fridge of craft beer available. Excellent reviews and seems to have a good casual atmosphere and social focus. (Added August 2024)

name: Grand Pub Bruntál
description:
City: Bruntál
description: A warm wood-strip pub with a social focus, characterful rooms with communal seating that looks pretty good all told. (Added August 2024)

name: Hospůdka U Dubu
description:
City: Albrechtice
description: A curiosity. Old house with old-timer hospoda but also has spa facilities, a pool, a garden etc. Excellent reviews. Worth a try? (Added August 2024)

name: Dropkick bar
description:
City: Reims
description: Bar with rugby decoration, casual hangout with table football, lounge furniture etc, and a good selection of drinks. Pretty pubby. On our first visit it was a punkier hangout than expected though there were families present too. This isn't the sports bar you may think. It didn't quite hit the mark for a guide entry but is worth keeping in mind if you are looking around for alternative options. (Added August 2024)

name: Old Crown Inn
description:
City: Shardlow
description: Atmospheric traditional pub with mugs hung from the beams, well reviewed. Seems to be worth a try! (Added August 2024)

name: Partizan Tavern
description:
City: Nottingham
description: Curious venture, inspired by a 1990 Notts County youth tournament played in Serbia. Ciders, high quality beers and a simple ale house environment. Charming hospitality and interesting football decorations. Furniture otherwise a bit plain. We'll give it another try soon. (Added August 2024)

name: The Duke Of Wellington
description:
City: Norwich
description: Victorian corner pub with a few alterations but some character. Somewhat of a throwback operation with live music, bbqs and real ale festivals. It didn't quite tick enough boxes to get an inscription but having only been the one time, we feel confident to give it a tentative wider recommendation. (Added August 2024)

name: Bonchurch Inn
description:
City: Ventnor
description: A 3 star listed (top category) Heritage Inn. Excellent reviews and traditional interior. (Added August 2024)

name: The Mountain Daisy
description:
City: Sunderland
description: A 3 star National Heritage pub with extaordinary interior which seems worth venturing to all of itself. (Added August 2024)

name: The American Bar
description:
City: Belfast
description: Appealing looking snug and characterful bar with some typical Irish trappings. Very well reviewed. (Added September 2024)

name: ECO-Bar By Michael
description:
City: Nessebar
description: Highly unusual concept bar - caves, waterways and leafy surroundings, you won't have been anywhere quite like it. Very well reviewed. Not for fans of 'theme bars' probably, but you're only in Nessebar once. (Added September 2024)

name: The Playhouse Bar
description:
City: Norwich
description: Arty/culture centre feel to this riverside bar. Great reviews. Worth a look! (Added September 2024)

name: Harp Bar
description:
City: Belfast
description: Well reviewed popular city centre bar with some of the familiar trappings. (Added September 2024)

name: Jóbarát kiskocsma
description:
City: Szarvas
description: Special village pub with old tools, Soviet kitsch and billiards table. Very well reviewed. (Added September 2024)

name: Babád borozó
description:
City: Gödöllő
description: Famous historic old wine bar with elderly owner, go while it's still going - he promises to keep it alive as long as he's able to. (Added September 2024)

name: Lidocain bár
description:
City: Kiskunfélegyháza
description: Funky courtyard bar with ruin pub styling and similarly designed interior. Well worth a look. (Added September 2024)

name: Corner pub
description:
City: Ljubljana
description: English inspired pub with leather upholstery, gin palace style decor, seems to be focusing on the pub over the theme, which is good, and probably explains the good reviews. (Added September 2024)

name: Levstik Pub
description:
City: Ljubljana
description: An old favourite locally, known for its fair prices. A simple, lived-in looking set up, still well reviewed. On our first visit on 2024 we found a character, cheap locals hangout - not quite hitting the mark but worth bearing in mind as a back-up plan. (Added September 2024)

name: Godec Pub
description:
City: Ljubljana
description: Cosy little rock/punk bunker with decent beer, stone walls and intimate vaults. Very well rated. (Added September 2024)

name: Turmstüberl - Bar Bier Snacks
description:
City: Villach
description: A Villach institution for over 30 years, a tucked away beer bar with good selection in a traditional cosy Beisl/Gaststatte type vaulted room. Super reviews and easy to see why. (Added September 2024)

name: Vinski bar "Zlata Kaplca"
description:
City: Kranjska Gora
description: A locals hangout in a Gostilna - rustic interior and good social atmosphere, more pubby than expected. It didn't quite hit the mark but of the few venues in the town, this is among the better options so worth having down. (Added September 2024)

name: Přístav Na Balkáně
description:
City: Ostrava
description: A cosy looking ramshackle, dock-themed hangout - definitely a boozer, not a restaurant. Decent reviews but not too many from 2024 onwards - need to clarify if this remains open. (Added September 2024)

name: Gasthof Drei Linden
description:
City: Bamberg
description: Very well reviewed Gaststatte with an atmospheric looking evening atmosphere, symphony in wood. Looks worth a try. (Added October 2024)

name: Velký Javorník - chata
description:
City: Velký Javorník
description: Hilltop hut offering basic, but warm and hearty wares in a traditional environment, including tap beer and spirits. Well reviewed, seems worth a try! (Added October 2024)

name: De Knijp Edam
description:
City: Edam
description: A superbly characterful, typically quirky Dutch brown café opened only 2 days a week as a passion project by some hobbyists. Seems essential. (Added October 2024)

name: On the Road Caffè
description:
City: Santa Cristina e Bissone
description: One-off quirky roadside tavern with barn-like interior, upturned barrels and rustic decorations. Very well reviewed, seems well worth a try. (Added October 2024)

name: Die Lücke
description:
City: Villach
description: Quirky little hideaway in vaults in the old town, very well reviewed. Looks decent! (Added October 2024)

name: CIRKUS
description:
City: Stavanger
description: Colourful and fairly distinctive central bar.  (Added October 2024)

name: Bacchus Cafe
description:
City: Stavanger
description: Old fashioned tavern with exposed timber frame and framed photographs on the wall, more a pub/café hybrid. (Added October 2024)

name: Original Bierhäusla
description:
City: Kulmbach
description: A central knajpa, traditional style (though a new fit) which looks a good option for a beer. (Added October 2024)

name: Brady's
description:
City: Dunboyne
description: Looks to be a bonafide classic Irish pub.  Whisky barrel tap fittings at the bar, live music performances, a true boozer. Excellent reviews. (Added October 2024)

name: Café 't Mandje
description:
City: Amsterdam
description: Famous gay-bar whose interior and history has helped give it international renown. An absolute must. (Added October 2024)

name: The Flowing Spring
description:
City: Playhatch
description: Bunker-like throwback pub with every inch of wall space personalised. (Added October 2024)

name: Het Wapen van Roosendaal
description:
City: Roosendaal
description: Lively central pub with musical leanings, typical brown café trappings too, but a higher tempo. (Added October 2024)

name: The Blue Bell Inn
description:
City: Annan
description: Historic 1700s pub with a warm traditional interior and good cheer. Well reviewed. (Added October 2024)

name: The Red Herring
description:
City: Great Yarmouth
description: Traditional lounge bar with familiar features - wood fit bar, red walls, carpet and typical pub furniture. Several cask ales available. (Added October 2024)

name: Bridie's Bar
description:
City: Bridgetown
description: A legendary grocery store and pub with live music and classic Irish character. Exceptional reviews. (Added October 2024)

name: J Beirne
description:
City: Strokestown
description: One of those grocery store/pub hybrids Ireland is known for. Exceptional reviews and local life, typical Irish character. (Added October 2024)

name: Hof Den Tuitelaar
description:
City: Meldert
description: Out of town pub with an antiquey decoration inside, but plenty of typical Flemish pub character too. Well reviewed. (Added October 2024)

name: Heckmeck Kneipe
description:
City: Berlin
description: Pubby kneipe with U-Bahn map on the ceiling but wood fit English style pub fittings. A casual hangout place. (Added October 2024)

name: Stagger Lee
description:
City: Berlin
description: Cosy, popular and very well reviewed boudoir style neighbourhood cocktail bar that looks very much worth visiting. (added October 2024)

name: 6:3 Borozó
description:
City: Budapest
description: A 'proper pub'. Simple borozo with a local crowd, very well reviewed. Popular and doesn't look particularly cliquey. (Added October 2024)

name: Barometar
description:
City: Sarajevo
description: Theme bar with brick vaults, colourful with a chemistry theme and bawdy decor. Well reviewed. (Added October 2024)

name: Borsodi Sorok
description:
City: Alsóörs
description: Popular traditional village kocsma with farming tools pinned to the walls. Simple, basic and local life, looks fantastic and reviews appear to agree. (Added October 2024)

name: Kék Duna borozó
description:
City: Tahitótfalu
description: Magnificent personalised saloon bar with a natural ambience. Warm hues, wood and rustic fittings, an out of time type place. Very well reviewed. (Added October 2024)

name: Metro Bar ("Subway")
description:
City: Ostrava
description: Retro kavárna in a crumbling interchange, a nostalgic classic. (Added October 2024)

name: Hebeda's
description:
City: Dresden
description: Wonderful looking venue - colourful old bar with wood fittings and eclectic decor. Looks to be on the bohemian end of things in terms of clientele and atmosphere. (Added October 2024)

name: Vinotéka Slávů Dvůr
description:
City: Slavonice
description: Popular and well-reviewed wine store with outside seating, tastings and platters, and a well lit cellar interior. (Added October 2024)

name: Cafe Platanos
description:
City: Lourdata
description: Mecca for bottled beers on the island. Cluttered grocery store interior is characterful with a really lovely terrace area. Exceptional reviews. (Added October 2024)

name: The Gwaelod-y-Garth Inn
description:
City: Gwaelod-y-garth
description: Semi=rural pub restaurant, perhaps slightly too foody but the interior looks unspoilt and appealing, and reviews are excellent. (Added October 2024)

name: The Peer Hat
description:
City: Manchester
description: Colourful, eclectic bar that retains a bit of a bohemian vibe despite the rampant commercialising of 'NQ'. (Added October 2024)

name: U Dreváka
description:
City: Bratislava
description: Surviving 'pajzl', cabin type hospoda in an old parking lot, cheap Corgon, seems a bit of a cult venue among that crowd. (Added October 2024)

name: Hostinec U Jelena
description:
City: Hradec Králové
description: Nostalgic interior and 8 taps of beer available, wood-strip walls, local life due to the peripheral location. Seems to be worth a try. (Added October 2024)

name: U Anny Šmejdířky
description:
City: Nymburk
description: A well decorated traditional pub restaurant with personalised fixtures, vaults and exposed beams. (Added October 2024)

name: Pivovarská brána
description:
City: Hradec Králové
description: Popular local multitap pub with a fairly traditional upright fixtures and fittings. Missed this on our 1st visit to the city. (Added October 2024)

name: Hudební klub Doupě
description:
City: Prague
description: Very interesting live music venue that also has a collection of gramophones and radios, looks quite alternative. Excellent reviews. (added October 2024)

name: Hospůdka Do Větru
description:
City: Prague
description: Alternative café bar with a very good beer selection, different from the norm, seemingly popular with students. (Added October 2024)

name: Quodlibet
description:
City: Marburg
description: Good beer selection at this unpretentious, cosy looking pub with popular beer garden. Good reviews. (Added October 2024)

name: Vinárna U sv. Anežky
description:
City: Prague
description: Lovely, homely and intimate looking Vinarna from times past. Excellent ratings. Can't wait to try it. (Added October 2024)

name: Bodega Teglskægget
description:
City: Valby
description: Popular old fashioned brunt vertshus with a pool table, lots of mentions of good service, and supposedly cheap. Popular with young people. (Added October 2024)

name: Hunnia Art Bisztró
description:
City: Budapest
description: Appealing wood-strip basement venue with live events -  apparently fairly quiet outside of those days, so check their calendar. (Added October 2024)

name: U Kajmana
description:
City: Prague
description: IV Grade panelaky pajzl which used to contain a live cayman. Quirky, decorated with beer mats on the ceiling. Small, intimate, worth a try. (Added October 2024)

name: U Tateru
description:
City: Třebenice
description: Famous 'tramping' pub, a cultural institution akin to scouting, a celebration of the great outdoors. Long standing owner. Featured on Czech TV show 'Praha Ozrala'. Superb reviews. A must-visit. (Added October 2024)

name: Šenk Nožíře Dobroty
description:
City: Polička
description: By Czech standards a very English style pub layout with compact bar and seats facing it, rustic interior with low ceilings, exposed beams and window boxes. Very well reviewed. A must visit if in town. (Added October 2024)

name: Bar Andílek
description:
City: Polička
description: Compact bar with red wall and retro plate signage. Looks superior for a small provincial town. Well reviewed. (Added October 2024)

name: La Fontaine
description:
City: Copenhagen
description: Famous small jazz bar with history. Intimate space, red walls, candlelight. Free entry outside of live music hours (9pm-1am on Friday-Saturday-Sunday) (Added October 2024)

name: Kahyt & Kaffe
description:
City: Copenhagen
description: A bar on board an old steamboat, well reviewed and looks well worth trying!  Please note it may keep seasonal hours, as was closed on our November visit (Added October 2024)

name: Cafe Ægir
description:
City: Copenhagen
description: Brunts Vaertshus, a brown pub, traditional with wood fitting, shady atmosphere, old school. (Added October 2024)

name: Haabet Bodega bar
description:
City: Copenhagen
description: Popular brunt vaertshus/brown pub with the typical traditional interior, a bit more dressy with wallpaper, chandeliers and frames, but looks rather atmospheric as an evening venue. Worth a try. (Added October 2024)

name: Tingkroen
description:
City: Copenhagen
description: Friendly, homely traditional bodega, well reviewed. Pool, typical Copenhagen bodega decor inside, and considering the format very well reviewed too. (Added October 2024)

name: Café Halvvejen
description:
City: Copenhagen
description: Superb distinctive brown pub which is positioned on the classier end but without losing its pubby feel by the look of it. Unusually unanimous positive reviews too for a major capital city. (Added October 2024)

name: Brewery of Saint Mars of the Desert
description:
City: Sheffield
description: Limited opening hours but looks like there's plenty to get stuck into here at a superbly reviewed craft brewery tap specialising in European styles. (Added November 2024)

name: Pub La Selle
description:
City: Morlaix
description: A wonderful personalised little bunker of wood, nik-naks, lamplight. Quite a find. Exceptional reviews. (Added November 2024)

name: Točna Dlabačov
description:
City: Prague
description: A tram terminus pub with a difference - the pub is the tram. (Added November 2024)

name: Hospůdka na kolejích
description:
City: Mosty u Jablunkova
description: Unusually personalised and homely mini station pun that looks worth a try. (added November 2024)

name: Hájenka Kersko
description:
City: Hradištko
description: A pleasant rural inn with wood strip walls, the usual mounted hunting trophies, pleasant garden. Set in a nature reserve. (Added November 2024)

name: The Boatmans Rest
description:
City: Worsbrough
description: Well reviewed pub on the edge of the countryside. Mock tudor, some question as to whether the black beams have been ruined by a makeover. (Added November 2024)

name: U Malého Glena Restaurace & Jazz Klub
description:
City: Prague
description: Iconic jazz club with a long history, not sure why we left the place off this guide for so long, but need to pay a visit soon. Featured in the 2024 series "Drunk Prague" on Czech TV. (Added November 2024)

name: Jarda Mayer café
description:
City: Prague
description: Atmospheric and well put together arty café bar in historic vaulted premises. Featured on the 2024 series Drunk Prague on Czech TV. (November 2024)

name: The Cotton Tree
description:
City: Bollington
description: A compact traditional pub known for draught Bass. Railway heritage signage and a cosy looking set up. Excellent reviews. (Added November 2024)

name: Pinkus
description:
City: Lichtenfels
description: A social kneipe and Gaststatte similar to the likes of Keimling in Furth, a good all-rounder that takes life more casually. Traditional and set in a timber framed building. (Added November 2024)

name: Brauerei-Gasthaus-Roppelt Stiebarlimbach
description:
City: Stiebarlimbach
description: A classic Franconian brewery gasthof with one of the best reputed beers in a star studded region. Exceptional reviews. (Added November 2024)

name: De Oude Sint Pieter
description:
City: Izegem
description: The most wonderful looking brown café with all the trappings of the best. Simply a must-visit. (Added November 2024)

name: Balkan Express
description:
City: Sarajevo
description: A characterful and ramshackle lounge bar with great reviews. (Added November 2024)

name: Zum Bierstübchen
description:
City: Mainz
description: A lively old-school kneipe with a casual approach, trad interior seemingly without the same level of tat/chintz of some. (Added November 2024)

name: Hospůdka Ateliér chalupa
description:
City: Morávka
description: A truly distinctive pub, with local artwork, grand views from the terrace and a cosy, homely interior, cabin-in-the-woods style. (added November 2024)

name: Hopkins Bar
description:
City: Enniscrone
description: An unspoilt simple local that ties back to the old days of Irish pubs. Excellent reviews. Worth a try. (Added November 2024)

name: Prince of Wales
description:
City: London
description: A must visit for bric-a-brac fans, highly personalised interior and character, real ales, well reviewed. (added November 2024)

name: Roches Bar & Restaurant
description:
City: Duncannon
description: Characterful pub with different areas. Attractive bar area, nautical theme, wider drinks selection. (added November 2024)

name: Rosengaardens Vinstue
description:
City: Copenhagen
description: Extremely characterful interior at this central Brunt Vaertshus where the old time surroundings and atmosphere are part of the charm. (Added November 2024)

name: The Bay Inn
description:
City: Bowling
description: Cottage c. 1790 housing a traditional pub, with the usual low ceilings, fireplace and intimate lounge. Well reviewed. (Added November 2024)

name: Library Bar
description:
City: Copenhagen
description: Grand century old reading room turned cocktail bar/cigar lounge. Grand piano, occasional jazz, pricey. (Added November 2024)

name: Andy's Bar København
description:
City: Copenhagen
description: Famous old dive bar which has found fame in the last 20 years due to being namechecked by Metallica. However, despite that there seems to be something about it - maybe the unchanged 1960s brown pub interior? Worth a try out perhaps. (Added November 2024)

name: Horseshoe Bar Glasgow
description:
City: Glasgow
description: Recommended central bar with interesting interior. Looks potentially trashy also... not sure about it. (Added December 2024)

name: The Ben Nevis
description:
City: Glasgow
description: Decent looking whisky specialists with a mid-brown interior and slightly baronial appearance. Very well rated. (Added December 2024)

name: Cafe Malmö I / S
description:
City: Copenhagen
description: Characterful candlelit 'brunt vaertshus', a brown pub, historic character and atmospheric interior. Nik-naks on the wall and...seemingly dildos on the ceiling. A shame we missed this place on our first sweep of the city! (Added December 2024)

name: Kelham Island Tavern
description:
City: Sheffield
description: Famous, well known real ale mecca that's always hovered around an inclusion. You may get more mileage from it than us. (Added December 2024)

name: Vivian's Pub Fairy
description:
City: Metz
description: A recreation of a ramshackle tavern, looks fairly effective, well reviewed. (Added January 2025)

name: The Mermaid Tavern
description:
City: Metz
description: A reasonably good looking central bar with good tap options, typical nautical décor but in a modern fitting. Excellent reviews. On our first visit in January 2025 we found a rock pub with a big range of beers, though the interior, aside of a few touches was fairly mainstream. Worth a try if you need a good backup after the main options. (Added January 2025)

name: La Chaouée
description:
City: Metz
description: A co-operative run pub. Ramshackle with local art exhibited and live music. Local beers available and a pretty reasonable happy hour. The venue overall didn't quite make the cut but we're leaving it here to give it another go and in case you'd like an alternative option. (Added January 2025)

name: The Black Cat
description:
City: Metz
description: A recreation of an Irish/British type tavern, but good beers, excellent reviews and amenities mean this might be worth dropping by. (Added January 2025)

name: La Quille
description:
City: Metz
description: Wine bar with communal candlelit tables in cellar vaults by wine shelves. Well reviewed. (Added January 2025)

name: Les Berthom
description:
City: Metz
description: Another branch of this effective chain of multitap beer pubs. (Added January 2025)

name: The Tap Tavern
description:
City: Kinsale
description: A superbly atmospheric looking bar, intimate with ceramic jugs fitted to the ceiling, live music. Excellent reviews. (Added January 2025)

name: The Grey Hound
description:
City: Kinsale
description: Well-preserved pub with partitions, fireplace and highly personalised interior. Well reviewed. (Added January 2025)

name: Srub U Kocoura
description:
City: Lety
description: A personalised wood-strip cabin boozer with river views - very well reviewed. (Added January 2025)

name: V pasti
description:
City: Prague
description: Private members pub (ie, smoking allowed), spend a few crowns for a members card then have at it. A dying breed of pubs, more of a cultural curio. Not for the faint of heart and some Czech pleasantries will be highly recommended. (Added January 2025)

name: Říční lázně nová VESLOVKA
description:
City: Brandýs nad Labem
description: A quite splendid looking little cabin with budget options as well as local craft beers. Highly personalised, not like the average hospoda. (Added January 2025)

name: U Kubelků
description:
City: Čelákovice
description: A village pub with an unreconstructed character - down and dirty boozer but the size and format of a community pub, which adds a certain something. Reviews all tell of dirt cheap prices. Interior has not changed for some time. (Added January 2025)

name: Velvet Bar
description:
City: Malmedy
description: Cocktail bar with a personal touch to the decor and lush furnishings. Well reviewed, fairly unusual to feature in a town of this size. (Added January 2024)

name: Biersalon®️Coburg
description:
City: Coburg
description: Exceptional looking venue with a multitap of Franconian lager options in a beautiful vaulted bar traditionally decorated with oil paintings, furnished with chunky dark wood and candlelight. (Added January 2025)

name: OTTO Schober Gaststätte
description:
City: Deggendorf
description: A classic dark wood Gaststätte with piano and guitar, a fairly casual setup albeit a pub restaurant more than a boozer. Exceptional reviews. (Added January 2025)

name: Theatergaststätte - Heiko Lange
description:
City: Wismar
description: Highly personalised down to earth little kneipe with bags of character, a rare sight. Exceptional reviews. (Added January 2025)

name: St. Vincent Bar AKA "The Vinnie"
description:
City: Edinburgh
description: Well put-together basement bar with classical pub fittings and a fairly intimate interior. Looks worth a try. (Added January 2025)

name: The Volunteer Canteen
description:
City: Liverpool
description: A lovely looking terrace boozer with traditional lounge furniture. Bookshelves and games. Exceptional reviews. Well worth a look. (Added January 2025)

name: Rocas café-théâtre / café-concert
description:
City: Luxembourg
description: Live music venue with Belgian beers. Fairly spartan on gig nights but presumably refurnished at other times. (Added January 2025)

name: Gaststätte Pinkus Müller
description:
City: Münster
description: A characterful, historic brewery tied pub that has modernised but in a way that is coherent with its history and surroundings, at least the time this was written. Looks well worth a try! (Added January 2025)

name: Weinhaus Sittl
description:
City: Vienna
description: A frozen in time wine bar with patina of history.  Excellent reviews. (Added January 2025)

name: Gasthaus Quell
description:
City: Vienna
description: Traditional, well preserved Gasthaus with a pubby feel, if foody. Exceptional reviews. (Added January 2025)

name: Bierakademie
description:
City: Leipzig
description: Intriguing venue, a blend of café, live music venue and courtyard with nostalgic posters and art nouveau antique shop fittings. Seems worth a look given its location. (Added January 2025)

name: dolfijn
description:
City: Ghent
description: Very appealing  bar with retro fittings in a modernist shop front. Minimalist, stylish, candlelit. Worth a look. (Added January 2025)

name: CLASSIQUE
description:
City: Paris
description: Stylish cocktail bar with classical fittings and a sense of elan beyond the usual - this isn't an example of cheap Wayfair instagram tat for once. Very well reviewed. (Added January 2025)

name: Pitcher
description:
City: Esch-sur-Alzette
description: Characterful and popular bar with a busy decor of retro Americana. (Added January 2025)

name: The Coach & Horses, Soho
description:
City: London
description: One of several Soho Coach & Horses, which can be a little confusing. Old time boozer with modernising in some of the right ways. (Added January 2025)

name: The Shepherd & Flock
description:
City: London
description: Classical Victorian corner boozer on the unspoilt side of things. (Added January 2025)

name: The Anchor & Hope
description:
City: Clapton
description: Compact, friendly and neighbourly corner boozer, good reviews. (Added January 2025)

name: The Olde Apple Tree
description:
City: London
description: A surviving unspoilt, ungentrified boozer with a throwback feel. Made TimeOut's 2025 list. (Added January 2025)

name: Little Green Dragon
description:
City: London
description: Essential little ale houses with good beer selection and cosy, green-hued interior. Excellent reviews. (Added January 2025)

name: The Ivy House
description:
City: London
description: The capital's first co-operative pub. A traditional boozer with impressive stage (think Music Hall). A community pub with long roster of events. Excellent reviews. (Added January 2025)

name: The Famous Royal Oak
description:
City: London
description: Characterful traditional boozer with more than a few quirky touches, a contrast to its spartan and unprepossessing exterior. Excellent reviews. (Added January 2025)

name: The Birkbeck Tavern
description:
City: London
description: Impressively grand, plush multi-room pub that is still a boozer at heart. Regular live music acts and free pool on Monday + Thursdays. Good reviews. (Added January 2025)

name: Prince George
description:
City: London
description: A really appealing looking multi-room pub of fireplaces, warm hues, stripped back furnishings. A must visit. (Added January 2025)

name: The Windermere
description:
City: London
description: A grand Deco style pub with impressively preserved fittings. Loungey space in places. Good reviews. (Added January 2025)

name: Yorkshire house
description:
City: Shrewsbury
description: Rare example of a central rock pub, 1990s style. Unvarnished and a mixture of Tudor beams and rock/metal murals. Cash only. Some decent cask ales on offer, otherwise a simple back bar. Didn't quite make the cut but wasn't far off. A love/hate venue for many, not doubt., but an important point of difference in a small city. (Added February 2025)

name: Zum Välta Brauerei-gasthaus Fößel-mazour
description:
City: Appendorf
description: Frankly incredible looking Muzik-stube, a complete throwback with antique instruments, driveway with porch and German singalongs. (Added February 2025)

name: Fecske Presszó
description:
City: Gyor
description: A reasonably personalised and distinctive hangout near the college, music theme and lounge furniture, all informal. (Added February 2025)

name: The Wern Fawr Inn
description:
City: Ystalyfera
description: A must visit pub with a highly personalised interior of nik naks and farming equipment, someone's labour of love. In 2025's CAMRA good beer guide also. Excellent reviews. (Added February 2025)

name: Soggy Bottom
description:
City: Saint-Étienne
description: Good beers and a distinctive venue, albeit with a very silly name. Well reviewed, and has to be worth a look while in town. (Added February 2025)

name: Lovas kiskocsma, kerthelyiség.
description:
City: Pomáz
description: Interesting personalised hideout with a curved ceiling. Certainly something different. Worth a look? (Added February 2025)

name: The Elephant pub, Faversham
description:
City: Faversham
description: A very well put together traditional pub with many of the key features you're seeking in place including frames and characterful interior, leafy beer garden and ale selection. Well reviewed. (Added February 2025)

name: The Goat and Tricycle
description:
City: Bournemouth
description: Specialist real ale tavern with fanciful name, notable for its glazed faience tiling out front and interior which is somewhere between classical and quirky. Well reviewed. (Added February 2025)

name: Café Cinema
description:
City: Berlin
description: Famous graffiti strewn hangout remarkable close to Alexanderplatz and more mainstream sights and businesses. Somewhat "discovered" on the tourist trail be surely a worthy diversion. (Added February 2025)

name: Bristol Bus Cafe
description:
City: Târgu Mureș
description: A very cool looking ramshackle old hangout with garden and knockabout interior. Alternative crowd. Excellent reviews. (Added February 2025)

name: Café des Arts
description:
City: Annecy
description: 8 beer taps and a historic venue in the old town with beamed interior and artsy décor. Looks perhaps a little staid (this is Annecy, but while in town perhaps worth a closer look). Well reviewed. (Added February 2025)

name: Grüner Baum (Wirtshaus Groß GmbH)
description:
City: Kasendorf
description: Classical Franconian pub with Magnus beers brewed by a Kasendorf family member. A typical traditional interior that should be left be and not modernised further. Excellent reviews. (Added February 2025)

name: Tafarn Sinc.
description:
City: Rosebush
description: Looks like one of Wales' most characterful pubs. A homely, lived-in and dare I say it...yes..rustic interior with fireplace, high-backed settles, dartboard. Excellent reviews. (Added February 2025)

name: Kulturbahnhof Parapluie Weiden
description:
City: Weiden in der Oberpfalz
description: Although it didn't quite make our cut, there is something charming and unexpected about this pub. A large venue with live music in a concert room with a bar area and lounge. Very much a cultural and neighbourhood hub for this side of the tracks. Be aware you can access this from the station platforms, you don't have to walk around (just be careful). We're keeping it here as a backup for you. (Added February)

name: Sam ohne Katzen SoK
description:
City: Nuremberg
description: Very well reviewed cocktail bar in brooding low lit, bawdy interior with cat them. Looks like this may have been where the former Mr Kennedy's was located. (Added February 2025)

name: HEMINGWAY'S MUSIC & JAZZ BAR
description:
City: Linz
description: Well put together moody late bar for cocktails, with the typical low lighting and library/study theme. Very good reviews. (Added February 2025)

name: ACW Saloon
description:
City: Plzen
description: US style saloon bar with a surprisingly firm commitment to the theme - something very different for Czech pubs. We ended up here out of chance in 2018 but will give it another try soon. (Added February 2025)

name: Restaurace & Hotel U Salzmannů
description:
City: Pilsen
description: One of the historic Pilsner pubs. We've been a few times and found it a grand space, but the social aspects left something to be desired. Still, we can only keep trying. (Added February 2025)

name: Tavern Na Potravinach
description:
City: Pilsen
description: Pitchside pub with a football team and pool table. Looks like a friendly, well personalised hangout. Good reviews. (Added February 2025)

name: Hospůdka U PECHTŮ
description:
City: Pilsen
description: Riverside pub with a strong identity, good terrace for outdoor drinking and wood strip interior with sports club scarves. Well reviewed particularly for the quality of beer tapping. (added February 2025)

name: Čechurovská hospůdka na blbym místě
description:
City: Plzen
description: A smoking pub with very personalised saloon style aesthetic, purely locals of course. Well Reviewed. Be sure to be polite when entering. (Added February 2025)

name: Franciscan Well Brewery & Brewpub
description:
City: Cork
description: A big budget venue with modern, low-lit interior and large covered outdoor area with heating in colder months. Upstairs "speakeasy" and function areas. Pizza oven outside. A functional, versatile venue that probably needs to be visited again. On our wider recommendations until then (Added February 2025)

name: El Fenix Bar
description:
City: Cork
description: Another Rising Sons Brewery pub we didn't quite make it to. Despite the name, the interior is a traditional one. Live music venue. Seems well worth a try. (Added February 2025)

name: Antikvariát
description:
City: Brno
description: A library-cum-bar with high bookshelves around café lounge tables. Looks worth a try. (Added February 2025)

name: Sandinos
description:
City: Derry
description: Colourful and vividly decorated bar dedicated to a Nicaraguan revolutionary, tying in together lots of global causes. Very good reviews and clearly one of Derry's standouts. (Added February 2025)

name: McGinleys Bar
description:
City: Letterkenny
description: Traditional pub with eye catching back bar fittings, and lounge space with low key, familiar, cosy furnishings and decorations. Popular spot, well-reviewed. (Added February 2025)

name: The Cottage Bar
description:
City: Letterkenny
description: Whitewashed old cottage with homely interior and striking, over-the-top ceiling decoration with hundreds of mugs fixed to the beams. Very popular and well reviewed. Looks a must-visit while in town. (Added February 2025)

name: Blake's Bar
description:
City: Letterkenny
description: Down to earth, but warm, and homely decorated pub. Think about pubs like Corn Dolly in Bradford. Excellent reviews. (Added February 2025)

name: Hostinec u Pundů
description:
City: Horní Žďár
description: A social document, and a community pub in one. Little altered homely hangout with the usual mixed crowd, occasional outbursts of music. Looks great. (Added February 2025)

name: Holešovická šachta
description:
City: Prague
description: Intriguing tucked away art gallery, courtyard and bar complex. Modern, slightly punk/boho, worth trying out. (Added February 2025)

name: Hospoda Na Padesátém
description:
City: Prague
description: A really nice little holdout of a pub. Personalised with fishtank and characterful bar area. Down to earth format, looks quite unchanged by modern times. (Added February 2025)

name: Cyngwajs - rekonstrukcja historyczna
description:
City: Lublin
description: A fairly charming retro/antique cafe. Excellent reviews. Thanks to Kocsmaturista for the tip-off. (Added March 2025)

name: Alt Berlin
description:
City: Berlin
description: Essential old brown Kneipe, exceptional reviews. Lamplit interior. Pool and pils. (Added March 2025)

name: Jinonická garáž (Cotton Bar)
description:
City: Prague
description: Possibly a diamond in the rough. Cabin style pub out in an area which to put it mildly is not exactly a lively, pubby neighbourhood. Info thin on the ground but worth a look. (Added March 2025)

name: Chapel of wine Szeged
description:
City: Szeged
description: Incredible chapel of beer with remarkable interior, and relatively sympathetic looking furnishings. Well reviewed. Surely worth a try. (Added March 2025)

name: Hasenstall - Würzburg
description:
City: Würzburg
description: A good bar in Würzburg? Steady there. Well, it's an evening bar that looks to have some nice interior fittings and atmosphere, although signs of that ridiculously tacky Kneipe stuff too. Oh well, there's so little else to visit bar-wise in the city that you should probably give it a try. (Added March 2025)

name: Bierhuis De Klomp
description:
City: Delft
description: Looks like an absolute classic brown café similar to the likes of De Pilsener Club in Amsterdam. Dark wood strip, lamp light, good back bar too. Board game selection extensive. Well reviewed. (Added March 2025)

name: Café Le Penseur
description:
City: Middelburg
description: Colourful informal bar with cultural meetups and some characterful interior features (beams etc), Well reviewed too. (Added March 2025)

name: The Joiners Arms
description:
City: London
description: Neighbourhood pub with a countrified interior - brasses and horse saddles, along with related ephemera. Half timber interior, upholstered seating. Looks well cared for too. Well reviewed. Looks an essential stop. (Added March 2025)

name: U Baumannů Česká
description:
City: Česká
description: An upright traditional pub restaurant type hospoda. 5 Dalesice beers on tap. Looks well worth a short train ride out from Brno Kralovo-Pole. (Added March 2025)

name: Hospoda U Orla
description:
City: Brno
description: Classic hospoda in Brno outskirts. Traditional taproom. Excellent reviews, but information thin on the ground. (Added March 2025)

name: Buthmanns Bierstuben
description:
City: Lübeck
description: Unchanged historic interior and 'brown pub'. An institution beyond the typical German kneipe. A must-visit. (Added March 2025)

name: Pub If - Lübeck
description:
City: Lübeck
description: Quaint little old hangout, a characterful pub with history. Exceptional reviews. Slight Irish leaning but thankfully not a theme pub. (Added March 2025)

name: Brommy
description:
City: Bremen
description: Excellent, atmospheric looking little bar with seafaring decor and green walls, leather seating. An old boozer. Well reviewed. (Added March 2025)

name: Gaststätte Horner Eck
description:
City: Bremen
description: Alternative/left-wing co-operative pub with cheap prices and rustic interior. Excellent reviews. (Added March 2025)

name: Haifischbecken - Bremen
description:
City: Bremen
description: Cult raucherkneipe (smoking pub) with seafaring decor, little gigs. Superbly unpretentious and distinctive for the area. (Added March 2025)

name: Zum Haltepunkt
description:
City: Bremen
description: A somewhat lost in time kneipe with a rustic late night drop in feel. A slew of negative reviews appears to have since been corrected by some more positive. Tread carefully. (Added March 2025)

name: Wiener
description:
City: Bremen 
description: Lamplit boudoir type bar with red walls, an artsy feel, and bookshelves. Seems well worth a luck for atmosphere. (Added March 2025)

name: September
description:
City: Lüneburg
description: Atmospheric evening place, low lit in historic premises. Good reviews given the central location. Looks like one of the few good options in the town. (Added March 2025)

name: Gondi Kult.Ur.Bar Bremen
description:
City: Bremen
description: Looks like a must visit corner pub with some stylish retro fittings, not the usual old man raucherkneipe. (Added March 2025)

name: Gaststätte Flusshexe
description:
City: Bremen
description: High-ceilinged corner pub with globe lights and a classical, warm, lost in time feel. (Added March 2025)

name: Heroes - Bremen
description:
City: Bremen
description: Corner pub, reasonably sized with pool and darts, dark wood and some interesting, unexpected stained glass features. Well reviewed, looks worth dropping by. Smoking permitted. (Added March 2025)

name: Ständige Vertretung Rheinland Bremen
description:
City: Bremen
description: Institution venue, framed photos of politicians lining the walls. High ceilings and grand, somewhere between cafe, pub and restaurant. (Added March 2025)

name: Rum Bumper's
description:
City: Bremen
description: Must see punk-pirate pub. As with most pubs in the district, distinctly anti-fascist. Typical punk environment in some respects, but more clutter around the bar too. (Added March 2025)

name: Die Fliege - Bremen
description:
City: Bremen
description: A little raucherkneipe with impressive wood fitting and seafaring theme. Looks like one of the better options near the station. (added March 2025)

name: Chameleon Jazz Bar - Bremen
description:
City: Bremen
description: Live Jazz in a low lit boudoir style venue with distinctive curved bar. Well reviewed. (Added March 2025)

name: Drittel Bar
description:
City: Bremen
description: Punk pub on the outside but a fairly cool antiquey lounge bar inside. Alternative scene. Exceptional reviews. (Added March 2025)

name: Hart Backbord
description:
City: Bremen
description: Approachable, friendly looking corner café bar with an alternative scene. Excellent reviews, looks to perhaps be a few different bottles and drinks available also. (Added March 2025)

name: Druide e.V.
description:
City: Bremen
description: Looks like an excellent old school pub with some level of local renown too. Wood strip interior and a neighbourly feel. (added March 2025)

name: Bela Lugosi - Nürnberg
description:
City: Nuremberg
description: Purely for fans of punk-alternative bars, but looks like a good one here, and so central too. Great reviews and a counterpoint to the majority of nightlife in the city. (Added March 2025)

name: U Chřestýše
description:
City: Plzeň 
description: A wrong side of the tracks hangout with snake based décor and informal setup. Looks more characterful than the typical setup, very much a dive though. (Added March 2025)

name: Hemingway Pub
description:
City: Plzeň 
description: Corner pub, looks more of a late bar. Informal, characterful appearance. Good reviews too. (Added March 2025)

name: Bierbar Funzl
description:
City: Forchheim
description: A market town kneipe but looks to be on a far superior level to most with retro signage in the interior, local beers and a much more informal atmosphere. (Added March 2025)

name: Das Balan
description:
City: Munich
description: Information perhaps deliberately thin on the ground but looks like another Boazn worth a look - atmospheric late bar with characterful interior. Well Reviewed. (Added March 2025)

name: Schwarzer Hahn
description:
City: Munich 
description: Punk bar with a classic alternative setup. (Added March 2025)

name: Bar Boazeria
description:
City: Munich
description: Very characterful, slightly hip twist on a Munich boazn. Very well reviewed. (Added March 2025)

name: Fairplay Saloon
description:
City: Munich
description: A very pleasant looking pubby corner kneipe with pool, musical instruments and arty decor. Surely worth a try. (Added March 2025)

name: Tumult
description:
City: Munich
description: Underground bar in brick vaults, characterful, unpretentious hangout spot. (Added March 2025)

name: Schön-Stüberl
description:
City: Munich
description: Boazn popular with 1860 Munich fans nearby. A real throwback of a kneipe. (Added March 2025)

name: Gaststätte Großmarkthalle
description:
City: Munich
description: Old fashioned classical beer hall that closes at 4pm, mainly does service for Weisswurst Fruhstuck, the famous Munich breakfast of white sausage and wheat beer. High ratings for the quality of sausage and not very touristy. As a venue it looks well worth checking out. (Added March 2025)

name: Café Merlo
description:
City: Brussels
description: Reasonably characterful looking brown café with exposed beams, personalised interior, particularly at the bar, and arty touches. Definitely drinks focused. (Added March 2025)

name: Le Marseillais du jeu de balle
description:
City: Brussels
description: Almost typed 'Marseille' in the city section. Well, it's a Marseille themed corner bar with personalised interior, Pastis and something quite different to the norm. (Added March 2025)

name: JORAN - Cidrothèque
description:
City: Brussels
description: An unusual one - cider focused bar in a pleasant, compact, but airy bar. Excellent reviews, a real specialists. (Added March 2025)

name: L'âne Fou
description:
City: Brussels
description: Very well reviewed classical wood fit Estaminet/pub with piano, mirrors, globe lights. Seems entirely possible to come for a casual drink as well as food. (added March 2025)

name: Brasserie de la Mule
description:
City: Brussels
description: Brewpub specialising in German beers. Unsure of the venue itself as a standout but has had so many recommendations, so need to try it. (Added March 2025)

name: L'Ermitage Saint-Gilles
description:
City: Brussels
description: Saint-Gilles multitap craft beer joint with an atmospheric looking interior, highly rated. (added March 2025)

name: U Váhy měšťanský hostinec
description:
City: Prague
description: Revamped classical Czech hospoda, in traditional style but newly fit. Excellent reviews with a continuity of good food. (2025)

name: Rennsalon
description:
City: Munich
description: Long standing staple of the district, looks intriguing, low lit with interesting back lit bar, a little ramshackle, great reviews. (added April 2025)

name: Zoiglstube "Zum Binnerlindl"
description:
City: Kohlberg
description: Zoiglstuben with old fashioned rustic family charm. They buy the Zoigl bier from other producers but otherwise the formal is similar. Go now before it closes. (Added April 2025)

name: Plectrum
description:
City: Bayreuth
description: A little cabin with personalised wood strip interior and leafy beer garden. Looks well worth trying. (Added April 2025)

name: BarnAut
description:
City: Catania
description: Atmospheric retro ramshackle café with leafy courtyard and shabby chic interior. Excellent reviews. Looks well worth a go. (Added May 2025)

name: Razmataz | Wine Bar Catania
description:
City: Catania
description: Classic retro café with wood panels, mirrors, globe lights and old signage. worth a try, surely? (Added May 2025)

name: The Fleur De Lys
description:
City: East Hagbourne
description: Classical styled traditional pub with timber frame elements, fireplace, dart board and low beams. Excellent reviews. (Added May 2025)

name: Mc & Sons
description:
City: London
description: Old woodfit city tavern bar accented by globe lights sets a classic tone. A well reviewed bar that's surely worth a try. (Added May 2025)

name: Roots
description:
City: Kimberley
description: Micropub with tasteful traditional fittings and retro hoardings. Several real ales available, excellent reviews. (Added May 2025)

name: Zum Stiftl Stehausschank
description:
City: Munich
description: A popular new format in Munich, small taproom that taps Augustiner Hell from the wood barrel at busy times. The format is quite like a bustling city bar as they try to capture the magic of the more impromptu options. This is a little more slick and bland than that, but the atmosphere when busy is good, as is the excellent beer. Worth a look. (Added May 2025)

name: Casablanca Bar & Café
description:
City: Munich
description: Looks to have some potential here. Characterful latin accented late bar with a warm interior and cosy surroundings. (Added May 2025)

name: Tavarn Ty Elise
description:
City: Plouyé
description: Astonishing labour of love. The connection with Wales and Brittany comes to life in a spectacular way here. (Added May 2025)

name: Trichter - Nürnberg
description:
City: Nuremburg
description: Unsure how this one slipped the net. Late bar and kneipe with a modern but fairly well-done looking interior. (Added May 2025)

name: Kavos Sunrise
description:
City: Kastro
description: Simply put, a legendary venue, with a venerable, grizzled owner hosting drinks in a beach overlook and cosy, highly personalised little tavern. (Added May 2025)

name: Kupica Italbolt
description:
City: Kecskemét
description: Old fashioned backstreet pub with classic interior and billiards table. Very well reviewed but little online presence outside of Facebook group Mutass egy kocsmat! (Added May 2025)

name: The Hyde Tavern
description:
City: Winchester
description: A colourful and pleasantly rickety venue that shows the diversity of the pub can include places like this. Excellent reviews. (Added May 2025)

name: Prinzipal Kreuzberg
description:
City: Berlin
description: Funky cocktail bar with a not too generic image, worth a look surely? (Added May 2025)

name: Madame Claude
description:
City: Berlin
description: Ancient old boudoir type bar in a former brother. Somewhere to hangout late. Occasional live music. (Added May 2025)

name: Clash
description:
City: Berlin
description: Classic punk scuzz bar with pinball and walls plasters in posters, stickers and graffiti. Cult venue. Well worth a look. (Added May 2025)

name: Cafe Commune
description:
City: Berlin
description: Leftist bar with a casual approach, a loungey cosy 'laden' as they call it.  Literary meetups. (Added May 2025)

name: Lerchen&Eulen
description:
City: Berlin
description: Off-beat, atmospheric, post-grad type bar, a bit of an all-rounder, but looks worth a try. Well reviewed. (Added May 2025)

name: Red Lion
description:
City: Checkley
description: A classic cosy traditional pub with communal bench seating and carpeted lounge, exposed beams and garden views. Excellent reviews. (Added May 2025)

name: Hugo's kælder
description:
City: Køge
description: A successful, and fairly swish big budget version of a traditional basement pub with exposed brick, wood fittings, warm lighting and very good beers available on rotation. Looks an essential visit if in the city. (Added May 2025)

name: Schokoladen
description:
City: Berlin
description: Alternative culture centre for events, gigs, late night parties and courtyard socialising. (Added May 2025)

name: Leeds Arms
description:
City: Scarborough
description: Compact real ale pub with fireplace and  exposed beams, keeping a touch of the coastal pub character. (Added May 2025)

name: The Tamworth Tap at Tamworth Brewing Co
description:
City: Tamworth
description: Traditional pub interior and leafy courtyard, a venue offering an excellent beer selection. (Added May 2025)

name: La Trapperia Beer Shop
description:
City: Córdoba
description: Belgian beers in a small bottleshop-bar. Excellent reviews, certainly worth keeping in your back pocket in a city like Cordoba. (added May 2025)

name: Sammamera Freising
description:
City: Freising
description: A traditional Gaststube with changing beer selection. Looks casual, vegan options on their menu too. (Added May 2025)

name: The Eight Bells
description:
City: London
description: Unspoilt London boozer with similar interior to the likes of the Lord Clyde in Southwark. Seems well worth a look. (added May 2025)

name: Au Revoir Bar
description:
City: Athens
description: Looks like a must visit venue. Atmospheric wood-fit interior with warm lighting and mezzanine. Artsy interior. Excellent reviews. (added May 2025)

name: Imeros
description:
City: Athens
description: Atmospheric late bar with boudoir type feel playing only traditional Greek music. (Added May 2025)

name: Bodega Josefa
description:
City: Barcelona
description: How did we miss this? A classic old timer bodega with all the trappings. Highly personalised. Looks excellent. (Added May 2025)

name: Apfelwein-Wirtschaft Fichtekränzi
description:
City: Frankfurt
description: Looks like a classic Apfelwein house with traditional fittings, similar to DAX if not quite as elaborate. (Added May 2025)

name: The Adam & Eve
description:
City: London
description: A traditional unspoilt pub with typical corner London boozer interior: stained glass, wet ceiling, ornate wood fittings. (Added May 2025)

name: Eetcafé Het Brughuis
description:
City: Muizen
description: Appealling looking pubby café with traditional fittings but a recent looking clean up. Classic interior with exposed brick, retro signage. Belgian beers, of course. (Added May 2025)

name: Restaurace Sport - Kuklík
description:
City: Kladno
description: A suburban pub with regular events and functions. Historic, and unreconstructed interior, very minimal! (added May 2025)

name: KAFE NŮŽKY PAPÍR
description:
City: Prague
description: Unijazz-style cafe bar with bookish, slightly pubby interior, live events. Superb reviews. (Added May 2025)

name: Hostinec U Farlíků
description:
City: Křtiny
description: Throwback pub with wood fittings, net curtains, mounted antlers (you get the idea). Village life. (Added May 2025)

name: FBB Klub Na Dráze
description:
City: Brno
description: Colourful alternative club-bar with courtyard and games. Entry fee at some times of day - be warned. (Added May 2025)

name: The Posada
description:
City: Wolverhampton
description: Heritage pub with some ornate Edwardian fittings, etched glass and high ceilings. Drinks on the mainstream side, but probably worth a look. (Added May 2025)

name: An Teach Beag
description:
City: Clonakilty
description: Whitewashed stone cottage housing a traditional pub, part of a guesthouse. (Added May 2025)

name: Saloon of The Artists
description:
City: Milan
description: Backstreet late bar with artistic interior, atmospheric. (Added May 2025)

name: Cox18
description:
City: Milan
description: Famous cultural centre and alternative hangout spot. (Added May 2025)

name: Ittolittos
description:
City: Milan
description: More of a traditional pub/tavern experience with craft beers including some on handpull. Leather seats, wood fittings, etc. Seems like it might be atmospheric in the evenings. (Added May 2025)

name: Leoncavallo Autogestito Public Space
description:
City: Milan
description: Self-managed co-operative with alternative feel and cultural events. (Added May 2025)

name: Cascina Autogestita Torchiera senzacqua
description:
City: Milan
description: Ancient farmhouse turned cultural centre/squat with a colourful and highly distinctive interior. (Added May 2025)

name: La Fiaschetteria
description:
City: Bergamo
description: Wonderful looking old-time wine bar/enoteca with characterful historic interior left to shine. (Added May 2025)

name: Il Brutto Anatroccolo
description:
City: Milan
description: Looks like an absolute must visit unreconstructed trattoria, a retro delight with fair prices for great cooking - seems to turn into a bar later, open til 1am. Warning - closed weekends. (Added May 2025)

name: Osteria del biliardo
description:
City: Milan
description: Former co-operative style bar with a stuck in the 70s decor and billiard tables. Play attention to the website as it isn't simply a restaurant - you can come for a beer and socialise with friends here. (Added May 2025)

name: Consorzio Birre Pub
description:
City: Milan
description: Colourful and eclectic beer specialists with a good range and seemingly good atmosphere too. Well rated. (Added May 2025)

name: Carrobiolo Brewpub
description:
City: Monza
description: Brewpub with exposed brick and well-lit pub/bar space. Seems worth a try. (Added May 2025)

name: Scott Duff Pub
description:
City: Milan
description: Despite an ex-pat sounding name, this charming pub-café with good beer selection seems well worth trying out. (Added May 2025)

name: Isola della Birra
description:
City: Milan
description: A cosy, wood-fit beer bar with a down to earth look to it. Reviews are mixed but the selection looks impressive and environment in keeping with what they're trying to do. (Added May 2025)

name: Blues Bikers Motorcycle Pub
description:
City: Milan
description: Excellent reviews for this densely decorated pubby venue which looks well curated with some decent beers available. (Added May 2025)

name: Barbruto
description:
City: Milan
description: A pubby beer café with a decent range, also known for its sandwiches. One 'to have up your sleeve', it looks like. Well reviewed too. (Added May 2025)

name: Stalingrado
description:
City: Milan
description: Lost in time 1960s beer hall who has seen better days, but the environment appears to still retain some essential charm, the survival element being perhaps the key to it. (Added May 2025)

name: Tassello del Sei - Pub Rock Birra Cibarie
description:
City: Milan
description: Well rated rock pub with warm interior and informal approach. Ayinger and some special beers on tap and in the fridge. Excellent reviews. (Added May 2025)

name: Spine
description:
City: Brescia
description: Beer specialists with handpumps, a wide range and a punky, lived in bar area. Very well rated. (Added May 2025)

name: Birrificio Herba Monstrum Brewery - BIRRERIA ARTIGIANALE CON CUCINA
description:
City: Lecco
description: A well financed brewpub in traditional style with murals on the wall, traditional beams and tables. Seems to be plenty of reason to check this one out. (Added May 2025)

name: Antica Mescita Origini Vineria_Enobottega
description:
City: Pavia
description: Superb-looking compact, traditional beer & wine evening hangout spot with an informal look to it. Excellent reviews. (added May 2025)

name: Birra Del Parco
description:
City: Abbiategrasso
description: Beer specialists in a warm, homely and compact tavern. Organic and unusual beers with locally sourced produce for food. (Added May 2025)

name: Restaurace a Pension U Urbanů
description:
City: Ivančice
description: A possible diamond in the rough, a densely decorated, wood panelled pub with lamps and bric-a-brac. (Added May 2025)

name: Hospoda na Vodárně "MAŠINHÓZ"
description:
City: Moravské Bránice
description: Pub set in an old waterworks, still with its original pumps and works on display inside the pub! Look very carefully at the opening hours on the website before visiting as it does not remain constant week by week. Most of the rooms with the waterworks need to be requested and are not normally open unless it is very busy. (Added 2025)

name: Hospoda Vechtrovna
description:
City: Troubsko,
description: Really nice looking station pub, minimalist but with some well chosen retro touches, a working stove in winter, Dalesice on tap. Directly overlooking the tracks. Seems worth a try. (added May 2025)
